3 . the accounting unit is the united states dollar .
6 . income consists of general resources and supplementary funds .
7 . income is recorded on the basis of funds or pledges received for the current year .
9 . all other income received by unicef is classified as miscellaneous income and is credited as general resources .
10 . the statement of income and expenditure does not include funds received and expenditures made from special accounts .
those transactions which do not require commitments by the executive board are maintained as special accounts .
11 . donations-in-kind , which are recorded as memorandum entries in the books of accounts , are not part of unicef income .
future acquisitions of unicef capital assets will be included in the capital asset fund ( see para . 22 below ) .
goods in transit to the warehouse are valued at actual cost .
19 . the gco inventory of raw materials , products in process and finished goods are valued at standard cost .
20 . furniture , equipment and other non-expendable property are not included in the assets of the organization .
acquisitions are charged against budgetary accounts in the year of purchase .

the financial statements of the organization for a specified period or at a specified date audited by the external auditors ( united nations board of auditors ) .
accrual of expenditures in each financial period means that costs are recognized when obligations arise or liabilities are incurred and not when payments are made .
a plan in financial terms for carrying out proposed activities in a specified time .
however , the executive board approves an appropriation of funds only for unicef administrative and programme support costs .
cash kept on hand by authorized officers as a convenience for making small payments on behalf of the organization .
contributions to unicef that are offered and accepted without reference to a scale of assessment determined by any united nations legislative body .
contributions pledged to unicef but not received until a future time .
currencies , the use of which ( mainly in respect of transferability and convertibility ) is limited because of foreign exchange regulations or donor 's wish .
expenditure for a financial period is the sum of the disbursements and valid unliquidated obligations made against the appropriation / allocation of the period .
the operating period of the organization , covered by the financial statements , is on a biennial basis .
since 1 january 1988 , unicef accounts have been maintained in accordance with the unicef financial regulations and rules .
fund balances and reserves represent the difference between the assets and the liabilities of the organization .
consists of funds available for the implementation of programmes funded by general resources and supplementary funds as well as funds available for the acquisition of capital assets .
income for a financial period is defined as money or money equivalent received or accrued during the financial period which increases existing net assets .
unicef income is recorded on the basis of funds or pledges received for the current year .
also referred to as " miscellaneous income " for general resources .
the unicef liquidity policy allows these temporary imbalances to be offset by up to one half of the balance of supplementary cash-on-hand .
obligations are amounts of orders placed , contracts awarded , services received and other transactions which involve a charge against the resources of the current financial period .
obligations may be maintained either for that period or until liquidated or cancelled .
the unicef accounts are maintained in united states dollars .
transactions in other currencies are converted for recording into united states dollars , in principle , at the united nations operational rates of exchange .
a reserve of $ 200,000 was established by the executive board in november 1950 when unicef adopted a policy of self-insurance for programme supplies .
explanatory or supporting analyses accompanying financial statements .
funds accepted by unicef mainly to cover the costs of procurement of supplies and services undertaken by unicef on behalf of others .
programme recommendations are often prepared in excess of the input available from general resources .
these recommendations are approved by the board as suitable for funding by supplementary contributions from donors .
when a supplementary contribution for specific purposes is made for such a programme , the corresponding commitment enters into effect ( usually between board sessions ) .
the unspent balance at the end of the biennium is cancelled and reported to the executive board .
these statements have been examined and include the audit opinion of the board of auditors .
the financial statements have been prepared and certified as correct by the comptroller .
its headquarters are at vienna , with a headquarters branch located at amman , jordan .

18 . part of the agency 's regular budget is entitled funded ongoing activities , for example , the running costs of certain training centres .
these are activities that are part of the agency 's normal programmes ; however , donors are solicited for each activity .
if donors are not found or if contributions are insufficient to fund the full programme , the general fund will fund all or part of the activity .

and local legal assistance and service agencies give top priority and preferential treatment to seniors .
in china , the task of solving problems concerning elderly people and continuously promoting the development of undertakings for the aged remains an arduous one .
the state also encourages the development of old-age insurance attached to personal savings deposits ; and guarantees the livelihood of elderly people through multiple channels .
china pays much attention to the development of cultural education for the aged in order to enrich their cultural life and satisfy their needs in this regard .
the state has made positive efforts to provide spiritual and cultural products suitable for senior citizens .
mass recreational organizations of elderly people in both urban and rural areas are growing rapidly , forming the backbone of elderly people 's cultural activities .
the state attaches importance to protecting elderly people 's right to education , and has increased financial support for such endeavors .
today , an educational system for elderly people that is multi-level , multi-form and multi-disciplinary with different lengths of schooling has taken initial shape .
in rural areas , governments encourage people in their 60s to engage in farming , aquaculture and processing activities .
in 2005 , more than 30,000 seniors received judicial assistance .
grassroots people 's mediation organizations in both urban and rural areas are playing a significant role in settling disputes concerning senior citizens and protecting their rights and interests .
by letters and visits , senior citizens protect their rights and air their opinions and advice .
in 2005 , agencies on ageing around china handled altogether nearly 400,000 letters and visits from senior citizens .

to study the clinical features , treatment principles and therapeutic effect of carcinoma of tongue .
two hundred ninety-six cases of carcinoma of tongue treated from 1975 to 1998 were analysed retrospectively .
the peak age of patients was 40 ~ 59 years ( 67.15 % ) , and it usually involved the lateral margin of the tongue .
ulceration was the common type.59.46 % of the patients were in mediatedadvanced stage .
the effective rate of induced chemotherapy before surgery was 70.5 % and 5-year survival rate 76.38 % .

to observe the efficiency of the acupuncture on the asthenopia caused by the convergence insufficiency .
the symptoms , fusion extent and ac / a ratio were compared between two groups .
the symptoms of 16 patients disappeared , 30 patients were improved partially and 5 patients were not changed in the acupuncture group .
the symptoms of eleven patients were partially relieved and 15 patients were not changed in control group .
there was not a significant difference in the fusion extent and ac / a ratio of two groups before treatment ( p > 0.05 ) .
after the treatment there was a significant difference for fusion extent and ac / a ratio compared with pretreatment in acupuncture group ( p < 0.01 ) .
the improvement of fusion extent and ac / a ratio were more obvious in acupuncture group than the control group .
the results confirmed that the acupuncture was one of effective methods in treatment of asthenopia caused by the convergence insufficiency .

to study of the role of endotoxin in acute lung injury ( ali ) and protective effect of rhubarb and dexamethasone to them .

biological markers were measured for the lung specimens .
the lung damaged by lps was congestive , and plaque shaped necrosis could be seen in part of lung .
pulmonary vascular endothelium was injuryed under electron microscope .
rhubarb and dexamethasone have protective effects to pulmonary vascular endothelium and alveolar epithelium in ali induced by lps .

to look for the health effects on workers exposed to concentration ( 1.040 mg / m3 ) acrylonitrile ( an ) .
an epidemiologic study with 224 workers exposed to an ( subjects ) and same number of non-exposed controls were carried out .
the levels of serum -gt and urine scn , compared with that of controls , were significantly increased ( p < 0.05 ) .
the average rate of micro-nucleus tested in peripheral blood lymphocytes showed significant increase , and smoking might exert synergetic effect on it .
it seemed that the slight adverse effects on the workers exposed to low concentration of an ( 2 mg / m3 mac ) should not be ignored .
to study the exposure condition for hydroquinone ( hq ) in the air of workplace .
the results indicated that the airborne hq exposure level at 0.442 mg / m3 was not likely to obviously affect the hq-exposed workers ' healthy status .
based on this study , it suggested that the maximum allowable concentration ( mac ) for hq in the workplace air should be revised to 0.5 mg/m3 .

the pathologic degree of pneumoconiosis and time after dust exposure would be the critical reasons on amount of dust removal ;

to study the effects of local vibration on the concentration of plasma nitric oxide ( no ) in rabbits and its relation to vibration-induced vascular impairment .
the concentration of plasma no was measured and analyzed in rabbits with different vibration strength and different exposure period .
the concentration of plasma no in experiment groups tended to be decreased along with the lengthening of exposure time and strengthening of vibration level .
the longer the vibration exposure and the stronger the vibration level , the lower the concentration of plasma no level would be .
local vibration could result in the decreasing of the concentration of plasma no , probably related to the vibration-induced vascular impairment .

it indicated that stress degree of drivers was higher than that of controls .
to study whether mercaptoethanol or vitamin c could block the inhibition of erythrocyte sod by cadmium .
2mercaptoethanol could partly prevent cadmium from damaging sod of erythrocytes .
3vitamin c had a function to protect sod of erythrocytes from being damaged by cadmium .
to compare and analyse the results of continuous and instantaneous sampling of industrial noise .
it was showed that the noise level was consistent with the type of work measured with the nl-2 .
aperiodic instantaneous sampling in the same type of work demonstrated that the difference of the results related to the steady state of the noise .
the steady state of the noise could be reflected by the standard error of repetitious instantaneous sampling and expressed as s.
compared with the instantaneous sampling , the result of personal continuous sampling was much accurate and objective , although nl-2 itself needs improving .

urinary cd-mt appeared to be correlated with urinary cadmium . a dose-response relationship existed between those two indices .
urinary cd-mt can be used as a sensitive and specific indicator of renal damage at early stage of nephro-toxicity .

this study was to explore the relationship between prognosis and chromosome changes in chronic myelogenous leukemia ( cml ) in blastic crisis .
the praparations were pairde and the data were analyzed after taking a photograph under the microscope .
before blastic crisis , philadelphia chromosome ( ph ) were positive in 18 cases , and negative in 2 patients .
additional chromosome abnormalities appeared in 4 patients prior to the development of blastic crisis in clinical and hematologic examination .
all of patients were dead except that 2 were beyond supervision . the median survival after blastic crisis was only 2.2 months .
in the chronic phase of cml ( before blastic crisis ) , chromosomal abnormalities besides ph indicate an unfavorable prognosis .
to evaluate quality of life of 40 patients with acute leukemia after receiving chemotherapy treatments .
the quality of life is the worst after chemotherapy 2nd-3rd ;
quality of life in remission period rose more obviously than those in 1st week , 2nd-3rd after chemotherapy ( p < 0.01 ) ;
the table can be used as a good index well for evaluating the quality of life of patients with acute leukemia .
chemotherapy is one of the most important facts that affects quality of life with acute leukemia .

our purpose was to investigate the expression of cd44s and cd44v6 in gastric lymphoma , and correlate the expressions with several clinicopathological parameters .
the tissue distribution of cd44s and cd44v6 were determined by immunohistochemistry methods .
a substantial positive expression of cd44v6 was observed in highly malignant gastric lymphoma ( 38 % ) , whereas it is negative in nearly all lowly malignant ones .
cd44s tpositive rates in clinical stage i and stage ii-iv were 30 % and 75 % , respectively .
the expression of cd44s and cd44v6 were correlated with aggressive histological features , and cd44s expression increased as the clinical stage progressed .

to induce immune tolerance to the allograft so as to provide theoretical and practical basis for anti-rejection of cardiac allograft .
the experimental animals were divided into five groups .
control group : no treatment to the recipients before transplantation ;
group 1 : the recipients received 50-80mg / kg cyclophosphamide on the 2nd day after pretreatment ;
group 2 : the recipients received 5-10 107 spleen cells on the day of pretreatment ;
preconditioning with spleen cells followed by cyclophosphamide can prolong the cardiac allograft survival time in rat .
the pretreatment of spleen cells followed by cyclophosphamide can induce donor 's immune tolerance to specific cardiac allograft .

gastroesophageal reflux ( ger ) in children is defined as the gastric and duodenal contents refluxing into esophagus duo to afunction of low esophageal sphincter .
the symptoms of ger include regurgitation , heartburn , infant irritation , dysphagia , hemorrhage , stricture , malnutrition , aspiration , apnea , anaemia and so on .
the latter 4 tests are not only applied for diagnosis of ger , but also used to assess the efficacy of treatment .
continued follow-up remains necessary to confirm the long-term efficacy of the partial fundoplication procedure .

the effect of phosphorus on in718 alloy was studied .
with increasing content of phosphorus from 0.003 % to 0.03 % , the stress-rupture life increases firstly and then decreases and reaches the peak value at 0.025 % .
phosphorus does not appears to modify the stress exponent but influences the apparent activation energy for creep markedly .
the beneficial effects of phosphorus mainly arise from the suppression of diffusion along grain boundary and the improvement of grain boundary -phase .

the results also indicate that solid-solution + water quenching + natural ageing is the best heat treatment technique to improve the damping capacity of the zac27 alloy substantially .

during the isothermal constant strain rate compression process , the effect of deformation heating on flow stress increases with increasing equivalent strain rate .
when the equivalent strain rate is relatively low , this influence can be neglected and the compression process can be considered as an isothermal process .
while the equivalent strain rate is high , this influence is of importance and the compression process can be approximately considered as an adiabatic process .

the unique rheology of the lecithin-water system has lead to processing difficulties in the drying of lecithin .
two types of dryer a re used in lecithin processing .
the first is a vacuum batch dryer equipped with rotating ball-shaped coils through which water circulate to maintain the lecithin at 70c ~ 80c .
although this drying method minimizes charring , it suffers from long drying time and difficulties in consistently reducing the moisture levels to below 1 % .
the second type of dryer is continuous , thin-film evaporators . there are two types , operating on the vertical or horizontal axis .
horizontal film evaporators have the following advantages : large capacity per unit area ; short drying time ; adjustability of thickness of film ; adequate process control .
one method to improve fluid flow without compromising product quality would be to confine process temperature in creases to around the evaporator outlet .
the difficulties associated with lecithin gum drying may be avoided by the addition of oil prior to entering the evaporator .
protein modification using enzymatic or chemical modification is important tool for tailoring food proteins into products with very different functional properties .
glycerolysis is a very complex unit operation .
this is useful for better organizing sfe experiment and obtain the optimal sfe parameters of a material .

according to the results , the temperature measurement properties whih t-thermocouple during microwave irradiation were also discussed .

there was no statistical difference between vm26 with or without mannitol and mtx with mannitol .

it 's necessary to open blood brain barrier before water soluble compounds of anti-brain tumor are used .

the suv tends to be stable if the roi was set 3 ~ 4 pixels smaller than the volume of target on reconstructed images .
different filter and cutoff frequency will vary the suv , especially on small lesion .
the setup of roi should be less by 3 ~ 4 pixels than the object , so as to avoid the influence of margin effect .
the filter and cutoff frequency are better to be fixed on every study in order to warrant the comparability of suv .

after scanning , mpr and 3d were reconstructed .
all ten patients were demonstrated on dsa .
in 10 patients , 11 renal arterial stenosis were visualized by scta with 1 ~ 1.5cm length .
the sensitivity and specifity were 100 % .
scta is a reliable method for diagnosis renal arterial stenosis .
it can replace invasive artery angiography .

to investigate epidemiological and clinical patterns of guillain-barre syndrome ( gbs ) in urban and rural areas in beijing municipality and hebei province , china .
on the basis of the diagnostic criteria of nincds , 54 patients were identified .
the age-adjusted incidence rates per 100 000 population for gbs were 0.9 in rural areas , and 0.8 in urban areas .
a peak agespecific incidence showed in adults aged 50 to 59 years .
a higher incidence appeared to occur in the spring and summer for rural residents , but not significant for urban population .
the epidemiological and clinical characteristics of gbs were similar to that reported in other countries . demyelinating gbs was the main pattern in present population-based study .

purpose : to evaluate the value of mr arthrography ( mra ) in the diagnosis of rotator-cuff tears .
materials and methods : comparison analysis of mra and arthroscopy findings in 21 cases of traumatic rotator-cuff tears were carried out .
( 2 ) the contrast solution extravasated into the subacromial-subdeltoid bursa through the cuff defect .
in 8 of 12 cases with partial rotator-cuff tears , the mra appeared as : ( 1 ) the supraspinatus tendon was thinner than normal .
( 2 ) an unsmooth inferior surface of supraspinatns tendon and ( or ) a contrast solution filled crater on the inferior surface of this tendon were found .
( 3 ) no contrast media leaked into the subacromial-subdeltoid bursa .
in other 4 of 12 cases with partial rotator-cuff tears , no abnormal mra was found .
the concomitant contusion of greater tuberosity was found in all 12 partial rotator-cuff tears .
in the diagnosis of traumatic rotator-cuff tears , mra is highly reliable .
the correct diagnosis rates for complete tears and partial tears were 100 % and 66.7 % respectively .

purpose : to investigate the value of 1h-mrs in therapy and prognosis of cerebral infarction .
the metabolites of naa , cr , cho and lac were analyzed .
the signals from naa , cr , and cho in the lesions were compared with those on the contralateral side as peak area ratios .
lac in the lesion was compared with cr on the contralateral side as peak height ratios .
decreased naa , detection of lac , no obvious changes of cr and cho were showed in hyperacute stage of cerebral infarction .
as time progress , naa continued to decrease of even disappear ;
lac continued to present in acute and subacute stage , and gradually disappear in chronic stage ;
cr and cho also gradually decreased , but the decreased levels of cho were varied .
1h-mrs can provide information about metabolic changes that may be useful for prediction of therapeutic time window of cerebral infarction .

to study the metabolism of perlolyrine in rats , which is an active ingredient from the traditional chinese herb , ligusticum wallichii franch .
after administration of perlolyrine and deuterated perlolyrine , the rat urines were hydrolyzed with glucuronidase , basified with nahco3-na2co3 , extracted with ethyl ether - iso-propyl alcohol .
the organic phases ( neutral and basic fractions ) were concentrated for trimethylsilyl ( tms ) derivatives .
the tms derivatives were determined by gas chromatograph mass spectrometry ( gc-ms ) .
it was proposed that the major metabolic pathways of perlolyrine were that the hydroxylation of perlolyrine and the oxidation of its hydroxylmethyl group .

to summarize our experiences and lessons of difficult tracheal intubation for clinical anesthesia reference .
we had done a retrospective analysis of clinical data on difficult tracheal intubation in 2 825 patients undergoing elective plastic surgery with anesthesia .
by the cormack 's classification , all the patients had the laryngeal exposure of grade ii or more .
the incidence of successful intubation was 99.7 % .
the common complication of intubation was airway trauma and its incidence was 19.3 % in all the patients .
anesthetic techniques could affect significantly the intubation time and the incidences of complications in the patients with difficult intubation .

to discuss the effect of weight reduction on fat distribution and parameters of insulin sensitivity .
methods 12 caucasian women with simple obesity , aged 21 to 65 years , were treated by low caloric and high protein diet for four weeks .
however waist-hip rate , visceral-total fat rate , and subcutaneous-total fat rate did not change significantly .
fasting serum insulin , and fasting insulin-glucose rate decreased significantly . insulin metabolic clearance rate and , insulin sensitive index increased significantly .
fasting peptide c did not change significantly .
the low caloric and high protein diet can reduce visceral and subcutaneous fat . weight loss can improve insulin sensitivity and increase insulin metabolic clearance rate .

to study the characteristics and pathogenesis of gut barrier damage following multiple firearm injuries in porcine models .
the animals were sacrificed at 72 hand ileum tissues were harvested for pathological examination and dao measurement .
one animal was sacrificed randomly at each stage for pathological study .
the residual cavity of one partially occluded model artery was enlarged .
two models ruptured on four and five days after embolization .
three embolized models and their parent arteries were all occluded .
pathological findings : acute pathological reaction occurred within vessels embolized with cap .
the orifices of aneurysmal models were covered with newly developed fibrous tissue and endothelial cells in two months after thrombosis .
we think that acute chemical erosive effect of cap was evident . a strong effect could lead to rupture of some of the cap thrombosed aneurysmal models .
besides , stenosis or occlusion of the parent arteries could be induced in some cases after embolization with cap .
for the above shortcomings and limitations , it should be improved carefully before it is applied in clinic .

purpose : to discuss the method of carotid artery with electron beam computed tomography ( ebct ) , and to evaluate the clinical value .
materials and methods : ct angiography was used to evaluate carotid arteries in 53 patients .
the data from ebct section were transferred to an independent workstation for reconstruction .
the correlation of ebcta and dsa were studied in 10 patients .
( 1 ) comparison with helical cta ebcta can demonstrate a longer segment of carotid artery with a shorter scan time .
( 2 ) to reveal the degree of carotid stenosis with mip was better than other reconstruction formats .
( 3 ) the ebcta shows the degree of the carotid stenosis quite well , and highly agreed with dsa ( 7 = 0.9935 ) .
( 4 ) the ebcta can provide some information about the morphology of carotid stenosis , such as calcific plaque and ulceration .
purpose : to study the ct characteristics of sinonasal fungal disease .
the density of opacity was inhomogeneous in 87 cases ( 84.4 % ) and homogeneous in 16 cases ( 15.6 % ) .
in all cases with partially opaque sinus the fungal disease presented as an irregular high density soft tissue mass inside the air-filled sinus with mucosal thickening .
all cases had bone thickening and sclerosis of the wall of sinus , and 91.3 % cases had calcification in the high density soft tissue lesion .
no enhancement could be seen in all cases with post-contrast ct images .
the ct findings of sinonasal fungal disease is characteristic . plain ct examination should be used as a method of first choice in the diagnosis of the disease .
the comparison study of t2wi mri and pathological findings indicated that the chsis might be caused by mucus filled glandular tissue .
the presence of chsis on t2 wi mri favours the diagnosis of adenocarcinoma .
purpose : to further appraise the ct features of active pulmonary tuberculosis ( tb ) and their clinical application .
the lesions occurred in the apical or posterior segment of upper lobe or in the superior segment of lower lobe in 28 cases .
heterogeneous , irregular , and illegille opacities were found in 20 cases .
calcification inside the lesion was found in 14 cases , and among them 9 cases had the calcification in the thickened wall of narrowed or obstructed bronchus .
eleven had multiple small cavities within area of consolidation .
bronchogenic spread was detected in 15 cases .
the main ct findings of inactive tuberculosis were fibrotic changes , pleural thickening and mediastinal nodal calcification .
ct images can improve the accuracy in diagnosis of active pulmonary tuberculosis , and is helpful in differentiating inactive one .
purpose : to study the signs of bronchiectasis on high resolution ct ( hrct ) images , evaluate the significance of hrct in the diagnosis of bronchiectasis .
after chest radiography hrct is the first choice valuable method for the diagnosis of bronchiectasis . it may reduce the need of bronchography in the diagnosis of bronchiectasis .
to investigate the value of ct and mri in the diagnosis of pituitary apoplexy by analyzing the ct , mri and clinical appearances .
materials and methods : forty six cases of pituitary apoplexy , proven surgically and pathologically , were analyzed retrospectively .
the age of 20 men and 26 women ranged from 23 to 69 years ( mean 44 years ) .
32 patients underwent ct examinations with ( n = 25 ) and without ( n = 32 ) intravenous injection contrast media .
mri were carried out for 46 cases and 32 of them had gd - enhanced t1 wi studies .
all the 46 cases of pituitary apoplexy suffered from a sudden hemorrhage or infarction of pituitary macroadenomas .
among 32 plain ct scans , 17 cases showed patchy high density shadows compatible with hemorrhage of pituitary macroadenomas .
no enhancement could be revealed in the areas of hemorrhage and necrosis on the postcontrast ct images .
mri findings of 46 cases included : 29 cases of hemorrhage in tumors with high intensity on both t1 wi and t2 wi ;
10 cases of necrosis with low intensity on t1 wi and high intensity on t2 wi ;
8 cases of hemorrhage and necrosis . no enhancement could be seen in the areas of hemorrhage and necrosis on the post - contrast mr images .
the clinical presentations were abrupt onset of one or more of the following symptoms , including severe headache ( n = 26 ) ;
ct and mri combined with clinical presentations are of great value in the diagnosis , treatment and follow up of pituitary apoplexy .
to estimate the diagnostic value of ct and mri of intracranial epidermoid cyst .

purpose : to evaluate the clinical application of mr urography ( mru ) in the diagnosis of urinary tract obstruction .
materials and methods : cerebral angiograms of 183 patients with intracranial avms were examined to find the morphological features of the lesions .
68.9 % of the lesions located superficially ;
there were 79.3 % intracranial avms with volume ranged 0 ~ 30mm3 ;
16.9 % intracrnial avms had associated with aneurysm including feeding artery aneurysm and intranidal aneurysm ;
there were 8.2 % intracranial avms with venous stenosis .
most intracranial avms located superficially ;
their volume mostly ranged 0 ~ 30mm3 ;
less intracranial avms associated with aneurysm and drainage vein stenosis ;
some intracranial avms had serious blood stolen ;
more than half of the intracranial avms were central drainage .

to evaluate the clinical value of ct - guided percutaneous mediastinal core biopsy with cutting needles .

complications , including 3 cases of pneumothorax , 5 cases of lung hemorrhage and 3 cases of mediastinal hemorrhage , are associated with the path of puncture .
the overall incidence was 34.4 % ( 11 / 32 ) , without need of special treatment .
ct - guided percutaneous medlastinal core biopsy with cutting needles provides high histological diagnostic accuracy . it is a relatively safe procedure and should be performed selectively .

purpose : for improvement of diagnostic accuracy , hrct and pathological characteristics of peripheral pulmonary hamartoma ( pph ) were evaluated .
fourteen and 11 of 25 lesions were located in right and left lung respectively .

another one ( 4 % ) was located 4.4cm away from the pleura .
a vessel entering into the mass was seen in 7cases ( 28 % ) . fat was shown in 4 cases ( 16 % ) .
certain specific ct features of pph , including clear - cut margin , calcification and fat inside etc , are very useful for correct diagnosis of pph .

to analyse the ct dynamic enhancement patterns of various types of solitary pulmonary nodules ( spn ) and investigate the value in the diagnosis of spn .
most squamous cell carcinomas showed inhomogeneous or peripheral enhancement with different thickness and irregular inner margin of the enhanced areas .
most tuberculomas showed no enhancement or a very thin peripheral enhancement with a regular inner edge of the enhanced areas .
most other inflammatory nodules showed inhomogeneous enhancement . for peripheral enhancement , the r of lung carcinomas was less than that of tuberculomas ( p < 0.05 ) .
the enhancement patterns reflect the pathological structure of spn and is helpful in the diagnosis of spn .
ring enhancement with a regular inner edge is a specific feature of tuberculoma .

we found a sparkle noise in the radio-frequency excitation signal of lmw-400 mri system manufactured by guangdong weida medical apparatus ( group ) corporation .
this sparkle noise appeared just following the rf pulse and had a maximum level of about 40 % of maximum rf pulse level .
furthermore , since this sparkle noise existed during the read-out gradient period , it must be eliminated in order to reduce image artifacts .
tests on the modulation board showed that this noise was inherent due to abrupt rising edges of two control signals .
simple integrating circuits had been applied to those two signals and the sparkle noise could be eliminated successfully by the modification .

our aim was to investigate the relationship between hyperglycemia and glucose toxicity contributing to impaired insulin secretion in type 2 diabetes .
fourteen patients with type 2 diabetes were divided into 3 groups received diet and exercise therapy , or oral hypoglycemic agents ( oha ) , or insulin .
the level of glycemia insulin reached the peak when the glucose level was 7.8 mmol/l .
then the level of glycemia insulin decreased as the glucose level remained at 10 mmol/l .
the relationship between the insulin secretion and elevated fasting glucose showed an inverted-u-shaped curve .
insulin secretion significantly increased only with effective glycemia control , no matter which kind of treatment was conducted .
glucose toxicity was the key point to induce and accelerate the dysfunction of pancreatic cells in type 2 diabetes mellitus .
the effective glycemic control was the only method to break the vicious circle .

to study the release kinetics and release mechanisms of ethylcellulose solid dispersion granules and tablets .
the sequence of fitness ( from good to bad ) of granules dissolution model was : zero-order model , higuchi model , first-order model .
the sequence of fitness ( from good to bad ) of tablets disslution model was : hig uchi model , first-order model , zero-order model .
the drug release of granules was surface diffusion mechanism , following zero-order release kinetics .
the drug release of tablet s was matrix diffusion mechanism , following highchi square root equation .

the pharmacokinetics and relative bioavailability of dispersible tablet of co-trimexazole were studied in 10 healthy male volunteers .
a ywg-c18 column ( 250 mm 4.6 mm id , particle size , 10 m ) was used ;
the mobile phase was meoh-phosphate buffer ( ph7.0 ) -etoac ( 75:25:1 ) with a flow rate of 1.0 ml.min-1 and detected at 312 nm .
a regression equation was set up , the precision of the method and the recovery rates were measured .
regression equation was a = 19058.54m + 1352.66 , r = 0.9997 , over the range of 0.6375 ~ 6.4375 g ;
the rsd for the intra-day and inter-day was 1.15 % , 0.44 % , respectively ;
the mean recoveries were 108.48 % , 105.15 % and 109.53 % versus the added authentic sample at the concentrations of 122,244 and 488 g.ml-1 , respectively .
the peak value appeared between day 15 to day 17 under the given condition .
the method is sensitive and reproducible for the quantitative determination of the ergot fermentation product -ergocryptine .

to determine potassium in chinese medicinal herb .

this method is convenient and accurate .

to study the action of the extract of peu cedanum praeruptorum dunnon ( ppd ) on monocrotaline ( mct ) -induced pulmonary hypertension in rats .
mct was used to establish the chronic pulmonary hypertension model in rats ;
nifedipine was used as the positive control .
the pulmonary artery pressure was monitored by r6000 polygraph system through the cannulation of pv-1 polyvinyl tube .
the thickness of pulmonary artery media was measured under microscope .
the composition of tenascin-c in pulmonary vasculature was observed through immunofluorescence assay .
ppd reduced the pulmonary artery pressure without significant influencing the systemic artery pressure .

to investigate both the effective the dosage and the toxic dosage of cbn on the cerebral blood flow in mice .
the blood flow on the rolando szone-motor area of cerebral cortex ( ap-1 , l2 ) was tested by the way of laser doppler instrument .
cbn effectively improved the blood flow , by the dosages of 12.5,25,50 mg.kg-1 , respectively , with the dose-effect relation ship .
the correlation coefficients between the blood flow downwards and the respiratory or heart rate decreased were 0.9393 and 0.9399 respectively .
cbn at low dosage could increase the blood flow .
while using the toxic dosage , it could decrease the flow with the obviously correlation between the respiratory and the heart rate .
it suggested that the acute toxicity of cbn may be related to the systems of respiratory , circulation and central nervous .

to evaluate the efficacy and safety of domestic simvastatin ( shenzhen boda natural product co . ltd & shanghai yanan pharmaceutical factory ) in treating patients with hypercholesterolemia .

the 92 cases were divided into 3 groups ; group 1 : qingxuan 5 tablets 3 times a day ;
group 2 : nitrendipine 10 mg 2 times a day ;
group 3 : qingxuan adding nitrendipine .
after 1 week control period the active exprimental drugs were started separately , the observation was lasted 6 weeks .
qingxuan possessed the same blood pressure lowering effect with nitrendipine for the mild and moderate hypertensive patients .
the improvement of hypertensive symptoms of qingxuan was better than nitrendipine .
qingxuan is one of the selective antihypertensive drugs for the treatment of mild and modevate hypertensive patients .

to study the pharmacokinetics of insulin by transdermal delivery with pulse current iontophoresis in rabbits .
the release electrodes of insulin were made . the plasma concentrations of insulin and c-peptide were determined by radioimmunoassay method .
the insulin absorption in the three groups of transdermal delivery were fast and the peak plasma level appeared around 2.0 h.
but the absorbtion was faster in the subcutaneous injection group and the peak plasma level appeared at 1.1 h.
the cmax , auc , cl / f ( s ) and v ( c ) /f were shown to be dose dependent in the three transdermal groups .
the absorption rate in the subcutaneous injection group was faster than the three groups of transdermal delivery , but the elimination was the same in all the groups .

to generalize the clinical characteristics and therapeutic experiences in heroin dependence patients concurrent with acute bronchitis during detoxification .
a retrospective analysis was carried out in 500 dependent patients .

to survey and analyze the epidemic characteristics of drug abuse in tianjin .
case retrospective analysis was conducted in 1020 drug abusers who were treated in ankang hospital during 1992 to 1998 .
most of the drug abusers in this area were unemployed and self-employed young men under the age of 30 with low educational level .
the source of drugs was black-market .
the abusing route was intravenous or intramuscular injection .
the consequences of drug abuse for individuals , families and public health were serious .
the key measure for drug demand reduction is to establish prevention mechanism , fight against drug related criminals and cut off the channels of black-market .
physical and psychological health condition and knowledge about drugs were interviewed before and after intervention in both groups .
to study the therapeutic effect of rehabilitation training on relapse prevention in heroin addicted patients .
rehabilitation training is effective in helping to reduce relapse rate , which is worth developing in the therapy of heroin addiction .
to investigate how long , how many of them and what reason heroin addicts would change their administration routes of heroin abusing .
a self-designed questionnaire for drug abuse investigation was adopted .
the duration of heroin abusing was 1-10 years .
the main reason for the change was to seek for euphoria , save money and drugs , shorten administration time etc.
the key time of prevention of such change is within 6 years after their drug abuse .

to study the clinical features of mental disorders and physical conditions induced by chronic alcoholism for further treatment and prevention .
there was a positive relationship between the psychiatric symptoms ( hallucination , delirium and personality changes ) induced by alcoholism and duration of alcohol consumption .
mental disorders and physical conditions induced by alcoholism are mostly correlated with the duration of alcohol consumption . it is suggested that early intervention will benefit the prognosis .

ll now , nine different gene families of phosphodiesterases ( pdes ) have been isolated froma variety of tissues .
each pde family and even members within a family also exhibit tissue- , cell- , and subcell-specific expression patterns and therefore pdes inhibitors have extensive physiological actions .
among these families , pde 4 is currently considered as intracellular target for new anti-inflammatory drugs and cns drugs .
in this review , a brief summarization is made on inhibitors of pdes along with their clinical use .
tumor-associated angiogenesis plays a pivotal role in the growth and metastasis of tumors .
many angiogenesis factors ( including activators and inhibitors ) participate in modulating tumor-associated angiogenesis .
in this review , we report the recent progress in mechanistic studies of angiogenesis and therapeutic approaches to cancer treatment through antiangiogenesis .
chronic nephrotoxicity is main side effect of cyclosporine a ( csa ) .
it is characterized of chronic structural changes , which are marked by increased extracellular matrix , tubular atrophy and arteriolopathy with hyalinization .
the above results indicate that angiotensin- converting enzyme inhibitor and at1 receptor antagonist may be beneficial to renal interstitial fibrosis .
the cardioprotection effects afforded by ischemic preconditioning are due to activation of the katp channels on the sarcolemmal or ( and ) mitochondrial membrane .
experimental evidence from animal models and clinical study has shown that ischemic preconditioning induced by katp channel openers can effectively protect the myocardium against ischemia-reperfusion injury .

according to the chemical structure , peptide antibiotics can be classified into 5 groups : 1 linear , helical peptides ;
2 linear peptides without helix , with a high proportion of certain residues ;
3 peptides with one disulfide bond ;
4 peptides with two or more disulfide bonds ;
5 lantibiotics .
according to mechanism of action , they can be divided into lytic peptides and non-lytic peptides .
peptide antibiotics have been used in medical , food industry and plant genetic engineering , and they have great potential in those fields .

most recent evidence demonstrated the existence of a pyrimidine receptor responding to utp but not to atp .
with the development and application of the molecular biologic technique and the cloning and expression of the receptors , the classification was strongly confirmed .
the mechanisms of aging-related attenuation in memory and learning is summarized .

cd59 has a significant protection on above injuries .

aim : to determine the memory-improving properties of huperzine a in aged rats with memory impairments naturally occurring or induced by scopolamine .
morris water maze was used to investigate the effects of huperzine a on the acquisition and memory impairments .

huperzine a ( 0.4 mg / kg , sc ) significantly reversed the memory deficits induced by scopolamine .
huperzine a ameliorates the impaired memory naturally occurring or induced by scopolamine in aged rats .

aim : to set up a new method to analyze multidrug interaction in combined drug therapy .
the different types of experimental data were analyzed by the new model .
this reflection method could deal with data in combined drug therapy , unnecessary to distinguish between independent and similar action , or exclusive and non-exclusive case among drugs .
to large animal or human experiment , the points of dose-effect of each drug used alone could be reduced to even 1 point .
the results of analysis took the criterion of a special field and laboratory error into account in this method .
the reflection method is an effective method for analysis of multidrug interaction in combined drug therapy .

aim : the fine structural changes of plasmodium berghei anka strain after treatment with the dihydroartemisinin ( datm ) were observed .
in p. berghei anka strain , 1 h after drug administration , the parasites food vacuole membranes were destroyed , and the pigment grains showed some changes .
the nucleus membrane , cytomembrane , and food vacuole membranes were stratified 2 h after administration .
at the same time , swelling and separation of the outer and inner membrane or shrinking of the mitochondria were seen .
stripped nuclear and cytoplasm membrane were developed and vacuolizations were seen 4 h later .
datm was a fast-acting and effective antimalarial drug . its primary target is the membrane system .
no obvious resistant characteristics were found upto 24 generations after resistant induction test for 4 months .
aim : to study the antidiabetic effect of oenanthe javanica flavone ( ojf ) .

the pancreas and islets were examined under microscope .
ojf 200 mg.kg-1 reduced the blood glucose in normal mice from 0.5 to 6 h after a single administration ig .
ojf promoted the release of insulin both in normal and in diabetic mice .
ojf decreased serum triglyceride and raised the lowered pancreatic amylases in diabetic mice ( p < 0.01 , p < 0.01 ) .
the islet-injured changes of ojf-treated group were similar to those of control in histology examination , but to a lesser degree .

aim : to search and purify a naturally occurring protein inhibitor of the furin-like enzyme from the porcine kidney .
recombinant kexin , a furin-like enzyme , from the yeast secretion expression was used as a target enzyme .
the inhibitor component was extracted and purified from the acetone powder of porcine kidney .
the inhibitory activity was monitored using a fluorogenic peptide substrate boc-arg-val-arg-arg-mca at spectrofluorimeter .
the purified inhibitor component is a basic protein with an isoelectric point over 9.5 .
this nonhistone protein could strongly compete with the fluorogenic substrate .
the nonhistone protein isolated from the porcine kidney functioned as a suicide substrate inhibitor for the furin-like enzyme .
blood glucose concentration was measured with the glucose oxidase method .

aim : to study the effect of forskolin on the nicotinic receptor ( nicr ) of pc12 cells .
the acetylcholine ( ach ) -induced current ( iach ) was measured on pc12 cells by whole-cell clamp technique .
the iach could be blocked by d-tubocurarine chloride and atropine had no effect on iach .
infusion of forskolin ( 1-50 mol . l-1 ) caused an inhibition on iach , which was reversible , concentration-dependent , and voltage-independent .
infusion of 1,9-dideoxyforskolin , an analog of forskolin which did not activate adenyl cyclase , also caused an inhibition on iach .
life-threatening arrhythmia remains a problem contributing to major death in cardiovascular diseases .
hypertrophied ventricle and exaggerated cardiac arrhythmia can be produced on chronic medication with levothyroxin and this model shares some properties of vs.
there is a significant difference in the pattern of disordered ion channels between the congenital long qt syndrome ( lqts ) and the acquired heart disease .
the affected ion channel in congenital lqts is single .
the disordered ion channel is the consequence of the vs lesion influencing the lipid membrane in a diseased heart .
the vs and multiple ion channel disorder are provided as new targets to treat cardiac arrhythmias in a diseased heart .

the advantages of using lc / ms-apci technique include better sensitivity , higher selectivity , and less time consumption , compared with hplc method .

and 3 ) the specificity of action sites of firing rates upon acute drug challenge .
aim : to raise monoclonal antibody against human m3 receptor .
antibody was purified by a combination of two-step precipitation methods and ion-exchange chromatography .
the specificity of monoclonal antibody was tested by enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay , immunohistochemistry , and radioligand binding assay of receptors .
the monoclonal antibody specifically bound to the protein of rat salivary gland and m3 peptide , but not m4 peptide .
immunohistochemical study showed that the human salivary cell surface was strongly stained , whereas the human heart cell surface was not .
highly purified ( 96.3 % ) monoclonal antibody against the m3 receptor peptide recognized the m3 receptor .

aim : to examine the effects of ascorbic acid ( aa ) and dl- -tocopherol ( t ) on the proliferation and redifferentiation of human hepatoma cell .

after treatment with aa 4 mmol .
l-1 and t 1 mmol .
l-1 together , the growth curve and mitotic index of human hepatoma cells decreased remarkably , the cellular growth inhibitory rate amounted to 61.3 % .
the indices related to cell malignancy alleviated significantly ; cell surface charge decreased , the electrophoresis rate dropped from 1.64 to 0.89 m.s-1 .
aa and t combination inhibited human hepatoma cell proliferation , induced redifferentiation , and reversed its malignant phenotypic characteristics .

aim : to study the effects of piperine ( pip ) on several experimental gastric ulcers in rats and mice .

the inhibitory rates were 16.9 % , 36.0 % , and 48.3 % in stress ulcers ;
4.8 % , 11.9 % , and 26.2 % in pyloric ligation ulcers , respectively ;
pip inhibited the volume of gastric juice , gastric acidity , and pepsin a activity .
pip has the protective effects against gastric ulceration .

eight-arm radial maze performance was used to measure spatial memory in rats , and the brain regions were subsequently dissected and histamine contents were determined by hplc .
intracerebroventricular ( icy ) injection of clobenpropit ( 50 g ) ameliorated memory impairment induced by scopolamine in both parameters of radial maze performance .
-fluoromethylhistidine ( 10 , 20 g ) , a histidine decarboxylase inhibitor , also effectively reversed clobenpropit-induced meliorating effects .
the brain histamine h3-receptor antagonists are highly related to the spatial memory , and this action may be due to cholinergic neurons .
aim : to identify synaptic relationship between aminobutyric acid ( gaba ) -containing terminals and substance p receptor-positive neurons in the superficial dorsal horn of rat spinal cord .
a combination of preembedding immunoperoxidase staining for substance preceptor with postembedding immunogold staining for gaba was employed .
' results : intense substance p receptor-expressing neurons were concentrated in medial half of the lamina i and the outer lamina ii of the spinal cord .
the double-labeling studies revealed that substance p receptor-expressing dendrites received symmetric synaptic contacts from axonal terminals labeled with immunogold particles indicating gaba .
gaba also co-localized with substance p receptors in the dendrites .

no marked expression of il-1 and il-6 mrna was found in hippocampal neurons of young rats ( 3 months ) .
' conclusion : the levels of il-1 and il-6 mrna in hippocampal neurons increased with aging .

aim : to study the potential of the psychological dependence of tramadol .

naltrexone was injected concomitantly with tramadol .
tramadol fully substituted morphine at a dose of 32 mg / kg or higher .
naltrexone antagnized the discriminative respondse of tramadol .
tramadol can substitute for morphine in morphine discriminatve rats .
the discriminative stimulus effects of tramadol are mediated by a mu opioid mechanism .

aim : to detect delayed afterdepolarizations ( dad ) in extracellular electrograms using signal averaging technique .
intracellular voltage was recorded with a conventional microelectrode , and simultaneous extracellular electrograms were recorded differentially from widely spaced electrodes placed in the tissue bath .
noise of electrograms was reduced using signal averaging technique .
acetylstrophanthidin and resibufogenin both induced dad in the intracellular recording and extracellular dad ( dad-e ) in the extracellular electrogram in sheep heart purkinje fibers .
dad can be detected using the extracellular electrograms combined with the high resolution , signal averaging technique .

aim : to investigate the mechanism of tricyclopinate , an antagonist of nicotinic receptor , on neuronal nicotinic acetylcholine receptors ( nachr ) .
tricyclopinate inhibited the nicotine-induced currents competitively and the inhibition was voltage-independent . the decay of the nicotine-induced currem was accelerated significantly in the presence of tricyclopinate .
tricyclopinate inhibits neuronal nachr by interacting with the allosteric sites rather than the open ionic channels or acetylcholine recognition site of the receptor .

a computer optimization technique was applied to the design of preparation technique of methotreate human serum albumin microspheres .
the effects of different factors on mean diameter of microsphere was studied at three levels accoring to uniform design of experiment .
multivariable linear regression was used to determine the relationship between the factors applied with the effects responsed .
albumin concentration and stirring rate during emulsification had significant effect on mean diameter of microspheres
and emulsification time and the amount of albumin had no significant effect .
computer optimization technique can optimize preparation technique of microspheres effectively . the method has potentiality to be use in other dosage forms .

baiyandong underground river cave system is located 7 km southeast to baojing county .
it embraces one main corridor and four major branch galleries , i.e. jiku , liangchahe , sanchaghe and tiejiangdong . elevation in dry season of 1999 .
from the structure and functions of karst dynamic system , the self-organization mechanism of positive feedback of karstification is analysed in fractured water-bearing medium of carbonate rock .
as a result two potential target areas were lined out .
case studies show that the method gives reliable results and is easy to operate .
the water recharge , regulation and discharge is modelled mathematically in jinlong reservoir , longzhou county , guangxi .
show that ( 1 ) the subsoil solution feature mainly formed at depth 0.2 ~ 0.6m below the ground surface , where scc is max ;
the cave system formed in cretaceous-tertiary period , it is still developing in the direction of vertical deep dissection now .

plasma hgf levels within 7 days after onset of ami were significantly higher than those of control subjects .
hgf levels in the culture medium of mncs ( mncs-hgf levels ) peaked on day 1 and decreased by day 14 .
a significant positive correlation was found between plasma hgf and mncs-hgf levels on day 7 after onset of ami .
there was a significant positive correlation between maximum creatine phosphokinase levels and maximum plasma hgf levels .
there was also a significant positive correlation between maximum c-reactive protein levels and maximum plasma and mncs-hgf levels .
maximum plasma hgf level is important in reflecting the extent of myocardial infarction .
mncs may contribute to the elevation of circulating hgf level in the subacute stage of myocardial infarction .
inflammation after ami is supposed to induce hgf production by mncs .
increased hgf level may contribute to the repair of ischemia-induced injury of endothelial cells in patients with ami .

to compare the efficacy and safety of dilacor and verapamil in the treatment of essential hypertension .
the heart rate decreased after treatment and the incidence of adverse effect was rare in both groups .

their mean systolic blood pressure was reduced from 157 12 mmhg to 128 9 mmhg ;
the diastolic blood pressure from 95 8 mmhg to 81 5 mmhg .
in this study the renal artery stenting appears to be an effective and safe treatment for renovascular hypertension . the long-term outcomes remain to be investigated .

to report anatomic correction of the transposition of great artery with ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis .
all patients received rastelli procedure .
eight survivors were followed up for a period of 6 months to 5 years ( mean 2.1 years ) and there was not late death .
using rastelli procedure to correct transposition of great artery with ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis could get satisfying operative results .

to explore the role of body antioxidation capacity in the pathogenesis of psychosis and its clinical significance .
the serum content of sod , mda , gsh-px , vc , ve and no in 356 psychotic patients was measured with chemical colorimetry .
there was no significant difference in serum ve content between psychotic patients and controls ( p > 0.05 ) .
the schizophrenics with family history had higher serum no content than those without family history ( p < 0.05 ) .
the antioxidation capacity in psychotic patients varied with courses , genders and onset ages .
the serum sod and mda content in psychotics was lower after treatment than before treatment ( p < 0.01 ) .
there was no significant difference for other contents between patients taking and without taking antipsychotics .
the psychotic patients do have abnormal free radical content in their body and this may be one of the causes of disease .

to study the expression of proapoptosis gene bax in hepatocellular carcinoma ( hcc ) and its clinical significance .
the protein expression levels of bax were determined by immunohistochemistry with envision system ; bax mrna was detected by in situ hybridizition .

the expression of bax mrna by in situ hybridizition were corresponding to immunohistochemistry , and there were no statistical difference between them .
aneuploid dna content was related with liver metastasis and cancerous thrombosis .

the positive rates of nm23-h1 and p53 in hcc with aneuploid dna content were higher than those with diploid dna content .

to summarize the experience in therapy of iatrogenic bile duct injuries ( ibdi ) .
a retrospective study was made on the treatment of 54 patients with ibdi .
six cases of them were damaged by laparoscopic cholecystectomy ( lc ) , and the others by open cholecystectomy .
roux-en-y cholangiojejunostomy is the best effective treatment for ibdi .
to study the diagnosis and treatment of portal vein cavernous transformation ( pvct ) in adults .
a retrospective study was made on clinical data of 15 adult patients with pvct .
all of the 15 patients were followed-up for 3 ~ 18months , the results demonstraated that reduction or disappearance of gastroesophageal varices and no rebleeding or hepatoencephalopathy occurred .
to investigate the diagnostic and therapeutic methods of primary splenic neoplasms ( psn ) .
the clinical data of 21 cases of psn were analysed retrospectively .
of the 21 cases , 9 were males and 12 females .
there were 7 cases of benign tumors and 14 malignant tumors in this series .
ultrasound and ct scan were the main diagnostic methods .
splenectomy was performed in all cases . for malignant splenic tumor , radical splenectomy and additional distal pancreatectomy should be done if neccessary .
adjuvant chemothepy and radiotherapy were be done for malignant lymphoma after operation .
the key points of the diagnosis of psn are the vigilance to the diseases and choose appropriate imagic examination .
surgical treatment is the first choice of psn .
to study the diagnosis and management of traumatic colon injury , improve the efficiency of early diagnosis and treatment , and reduce complications and mortality .
the clinical data of 32 cases of colon injury from 1993 to 1998 were retrospectively analysed .
of 32 cases , 24 ( 75 % ) were diagnosed early and 8 ( 25 % ) were misdiagnosed .
no death occurred in this series .

to summarize the experience in diagnosis and treatment of severe liver trauma .
diagnosis and treatment of 94 patients with severe liver trauma were retrospectively reviewed .
according to moore 's classfication , 52 patients were in grade iii liver injury ; 32 patients in grade iv ; 10 patients in grade v.
all of the patients were treated by operation . the curative rate was 83.0 % and mortality 17.0 % .
surgical treatment is still the main treatment for severe liver trauma ; protection of vital organs ' function and prevention and treatment of complications are also very important .
to investigate the diagnosis and management of pancreatic trauma ( pt ) .
retrospective study was made on the clinical data of 37 cases of pt admitted in recent 10 years .
there were 4 cases of pt in grade 1 , 17 in grade 2 , 7 in grade 3 , 9 in grade 4 .
5 patients with pt only , 32 patients with ( 86.5 % ) other organs injury .
preoperative diagnosis was made only in 6 cases ( 16 % ) .
operation was performed on all 37 cases with 29 cured ( 78.4 % ) , and 8 dead ( 21.6 % ) postoperatively .
to summarize the experience in diagnosis and treatment of spleen trauma .
the clinical data of 172 cases of spleen trauma in 26 years were analysed retrospectively .
results 13 cases treated by non-surgical therapy were cured .

to assess the clinical efficacy of the multi-link intracoronary stent in the management of coronary artery disease .
a retrospective study of 96 patients with coronary artery disease , who had undergone the stenting was presented . long-term angiographic and clinical follow-up were carried out .
one hundred sixteen multi-link coronary stents were implanted ( mean 1.2 stents per patient ) .
the overall procedural success rate was 99.0 % .
there was one death during hospitalization .
during 27 8 months follow-up period , there were no additional events and 91.6 % of patients remained free of clinical cardiac events .
the multi-link stent exhibits favorable performance characteristics and appears to be safe and effective in routine angioplasty practice .
patients treated by percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty ( ptca ) were retrospectively analyzed .
the perforation was occluded by long time balloon inflation in all 6 cases .
no pericardiocentesis and emergency coronany artery bypass grafting ( cabg ) was needed and no death occured .
coronary arterial perforation complicated by ptca was not common , rapid diagnosis and active treatment are very important in order to avoid severe complications .
none of 48 patients without post-procedural tnt increase had side branch occlusion and only one of them got pre-procedural tnt above the upper limit .
no in-hospital mace occurred in all cases entered in this study .
the incidence of tnt increase after cs is low
and the increase is due to side branch occlusion and / or pre-procedural minor myocardial injury .
elevated tnt after cs does not seem to be marker of worse in-hospital prognosis .
the more serious the degree of restenosis , the higher positive rate ( restenosis < 100 % ) .
the results conclude that ex-201tl spect has practical clinical value to detect coronary artery restenosis after ptca , and can provide basis for examination and treatment .
apa may be one of the risk factors of chd .
there was closer relationship between hcmv infection and production of apa in chd group .
to evaluate the application of early mobilization with a five grade protocal in patients soon after acute myocardial infarction ( ami ) and to probe its feasibility .
one hundred and nine ami patients were randomly divided into two groups .
the control group included 55 ami patients who were treated and rehabilitated according to the conventional program .
the mortality rates during hospitalization in these two groups were 10.70 % and 9.26 % respectively ( p > 0.05 ) .
but the mean time of hospitalization decreased from 24.67 9.85 to 18.63 9.12 days ( p < 0.05 ) in the experimental group .
to observe the efficacy of the venous thrombolysis in the elder patients with acute myocardial infarction ( ami ) .
the venous thrombolysis therapy can lower the mortality and improve the prognosis in elder patients with ami .
the more serious the coronary stenosis , the more higher the ox-ldl and mda , but the more less the no and sod .

to explore the effects of various doses of l-arginine ( l-arg ) on cardiac function .
l-arg ( 1 mmol / l ) group , all parameters increased significantly ( p < 0.01 ) ;
l-arg ( 10 mmol / l ) group , only dp / dt max was decreased significantly ( p < 0.01 ) ;
l-arg ( 20 mmol / l above ) group , all parameters were decreased significantly ( p < 0.01 ) .
1physiological concentration of l-arg ( 0.1 mmol / l ) does not affect the cardiac function of isolated rat heart .
2l-arg ( 1 mmol / l ) has a positive inotropic and chronotropic effect on isolated rat cardiac function .
3l-arg ( 20 mmol / l above ) have a depressive effect on both left ventricular pressure parameters and hr in isolated rat heart .

the purpose was to establish the relationship between cytokinin concentrations in rice roots and grains and proliferation of endosperm cells during grain filling period .
six rice genotypes ( including hybrid combinations ) were used in the experiment and the plants were grown in water culture with nutrient soluiton .
cytokinin ( zeatin + zeatin riboside ) concentrations were higher and reached a maximum earlier in roots than in grains .

the results suggest that the proliferation rate of endosperm cells and grain filling are regulated by cytokinins in the roots and grains .

to repair facial and neck scar using tissue expanding technique .
in the face , direct advanced flap was most common used , whereas in the neck , transposition flap was often used .
it was compared the advantages and disadvantages of several methods for repair of the defect after facial and neck scar excision .
fifteen cases had no secondary deformity after scar excision . among them , 1 case showed blood circulation disturbance and cured through dressing change .
ten cases were followed up and showed better color and texture in the flap , and satisfactory appearances .
tissue expanding technique is the best method for the repair of facial and neck scar , whenever there is enough expandable normal skin .

to measure the length and extent of the injured blood vessels in an avulsion amputation model .
twenty rabbits were randomly divided into 2 groups . group a was a sharp amputation group , and group b was an avulsion amputation group .
the length and extent of the injured blood vessel was observed with naked eye , operation microscope and electronical microscope , and the limbs were replanted .
group a and b were explored at three days and ten days after the replantation respectively . the patency rate and healing process were compared .
the vessels of group b were damaged seriously , the end othelial cells were deleted . the " jumping-like " damage could be observed in the elastic fibers .
the injury of 2 to 3 mm away from the normal vessel wall could be observed by operation microscope .
the damage of avulsion amputation vessels was irregular ,
2 to 3 mm or more tissues should be excised under the microscope in the process of operation in order to ensure the healthy intact blood vessel walls .

pts were followed-up in clinics or by inquisition for more than six months .
all pts have got the end point of posterior isthmus complete block without afl recurrence in 21.8 5.6 month 's follow-up .
in afl ablation group , there was not one case who showed posterior isthmus complete block after afl was terminated by ablation .
the procedure time , fluoroscopy time and energy delivery time in pace ablation group were significantly shorter than those in other two groups ( p < 0.05 ) .
positive double potential along the ablation line was recorded in only 37.5 % pts after successful ablation .
1all three ablation methods ( afl ablation , pace ablation and sinus ablation ) could be used to get a satisfactory long-term effect in the treatment of afl .
2the most important ablation end point is the complete isthmus conduction block .
3double potential mapping during procedure can not replace the posterior isthmus block as an ablation end point .

to explore the main risk factors of the onset of neurosis in undergraduates .
the results were analyzed by non-conditional logistic regression . results : the risk factors of neurosis were different with gender .
for male undergraduates , they were nervousness , lower level of mothers ' education , poor recreation and physical activities and poor family economy .
for female undergraduates , they were nervousness , introvert or extravert , obtainment or loss of social supports , and mothers ' rejection or deny .
the study of risk factors of neurosis should control the influence of gender .

to study the association of gastric motility abnormalities and autonomic neuropathy in type 2diabetes .
gastric motility dysfunction was found in 62.02 % of diabetic patients .

to investigate the cause of increased blood cell volume and its action on microangiopathy in diabetic patients .
activities of na + -k + -atpase and ca2 + -atpase in erythrocyte membrane were decreased in the diabetic patients , especially those with microangiopathy .
mean corpuscular volume ( mcv ) and mean platelet volume ( mpv ) increased and mean corpuscular haemoglobin concentration ( mchc ) decreased in the patients with microangiopathy .
whereas they were normal in those without microangiopathy .
the changes of mcv , mpv and mchc were related to the decrease in both atpase activities in erythrocyte membrane .
the increase in blood cell volume relevant to the decrease in atpase activities were probably important factors in the pathogenesis of diabetic microangiopathy .

pisha rock area is one of the regions with the most severe soil erosion in china .
water erosion and gravity erosion are the main types in the area .
waste land reclamation leads to destroy of vegetation and soil structure , deteriorate local ecological environment day by day .
there are large areas of degeneration land in china with serious soil erosion by water .
the water eroded area in the upper yangtze river reaches 352 thousand km2 with annual soil erosion of 1.56 billion tons .
both ecological benefit and economical benefit should be considered by taking small watershed as basic unit and combining comprehensive harness of soil and water loss and overall development ;
taking the basic farmland construction as breakthrough to combine soil and water protection with improvement of ecological environment as well as increase of agriculture production ;

ecological environment construction in northwestern china should be alone accordance with local soil and water resources because both water and soil are scarce there .
as basic resource for human being , soil and water resources are also the basis for sustainable development of state economy .
there will be heavy and hard task for soil and water conservation in 21st century according to state ecological environment construction plan .
the southern part of the province is dominated by water erosion , while the northern part is mixed erosion of water and wind types .
water erosion takes place mainly in july to september , and wind erosion normally happens in winter and spring .
the time process of soil erosion by both water and wind appears a compensation mechanism no matter in a year or during years .
plant can effectively enhance its rainfall retention capacity and improve efficient utilization of rainfall resource through changing rainfall distribution characteristics .
straw coverage can effectively collects rainfall , decrease evaporation , improve physical features of soil , and realize high and stable grain production .
the optimum core straw coverage for slope corn is 15 000 kg/ hm2 , wheat straw is 7 500 kg/ hm2 .
corn production increased 29.45 % when the land is covered by optimum wheat straw amount .
grain production will be easy to be influenced by too much straw coverage that is unfavorable to crop growth .
therefore , it has significant importance for the yellow river harness and western china development to strengthen comprehensive control of the interlocked area of water and wind erosion .
all relative departments should cooperate to provide services in agriculture , agronomy , technology and information for small watershed harness , development and ecological environment construction .
full ecological agriculture theory considers that water resources available for exploitation development exists in the all process of water circulation .
concept of dynamic water resources looks at water resources from the full aspects of dynamic process of water circulation .

the results indicated that resistance to sheath blight was a really inheritable character .

to summarize the experience of diagnosis and treatment for cystosarcoma phyllodes of the breast ( cspb ) .
the diagnosis , treatment and follow-up results of 30 women with cspb were reviewed retrospectively .
result 12 of 30 cases underwent local excision ( 1-3times ) , who were diagnosed as adenofibroma or massive adenofibroma of the breast .
23 cases were treated by mastectomy , 6 cases by mastectomy and axillary node dissection , and 1 case by wide local excision .
the median follow-up was 5.2 years ( 2 to 15 years ) .
the 5-year overall survival rate was 97 % and lccal recurrence rate was 3.3 % .
conelusion massive adenofibroma of the breast is a precystosarcoma disease and mastectomy should be done if local recurrence occurs after local excision .
the prognosis of cspb is related to histological grade , tumor size and thoroughness of excision .

follow-up of all cases were at least for 8 years .
compare the relationship between the operation style and the survival rate .
the 8-year survival rate were 73.9 % and 70.6 % , respectively in groups mrm and hrm , and no significant differences existed between the two groups .
the long-term therapeutic results of modified radical mastectomy were the same as halsted radical mastectomy for stage ii breast cancer .
patients with node-positive are suitable for using type iiof mrm .

to investigate the causes , prophylaxis and therapy of deep venous thrombosis in the lower extremities ( ldvt ) after operations for rectal carcinoma .
methods 8 patients with ldvt after operations for rectal cancer from january 1991 to june 1999 were collected and analyzed retrospectively .
the main manifestations were lower limbs swelling ( n = 8 ) .
the 8 patients were confirmed by the color doppler ultrasonography .
they were all treated early by anticoagulation , platelet function suppressants and fibrinolytic therapy and their effects were satisfactory .

the flavor constituents may be used in six itmes of food flavorings and properties of their main notes were investigated in this paper .
here reviewed are the application of biotechnology in the preparation of flavoring substances , with the emphasis on biochemical methods for the manufacture of thermal process flavoring substances .
lactates , inclusive of sodium lactate and potassium lactate , are widely used in processed meat and poultry products as humectant and flavor enhancer in recent years .
these lactates are proved to effectively inhibit microbial growth , especially anaerobes .
the mechanism of lactates inhibiting microbial growth is explained as it lowers water activity andacidifies the intraceuular structure due to interference with the proton-transfer through the cell membrane .
of couse , other explanations have been proposed but not confu-med yet .
it has also been cited as effective in reducing symptom of diabetes , hypertension , and function as an immunoresponse modulator .
hence chitosan has been a favorite ingredient for the health food manufacturer .
in addition to its health benefit , chitosan was also used for flavor , aroma and color stabilizer in food industy .
its anti-bacterial function was also exploited in food preservation technology such as pickle , sausage , and fresh produce in order to reduce the use of other chemicals .
these special functions are directly related to the cationic charge and the molecular weight of the chitosan molecule .
the cationic charge on the other hand is a function of its degree of deacylation ( dac ) . previous studies on the subject are relatively few .
recent technologyadvancement has allowed the production of chitosan with various dac becoming routine .
it has been demonstrated that the function of chitosan at 99 % dac would be significantly different from those of 80 % dac .
on the subject of molecular weight , it is well known that the monomer of chitosan- glucoseamine would be useful for prevention of rheumatoid arthritis ,
the chitosan industry is at the brink of major breakthrough with all of these applications .
however , industrial production of chitosan has been limited by mw material availability .
although the naturally occurring chitin / chitosan has been estimated to be around i trillion-ton per year , only shrimp and crab shells are economically feasible .
annual yield of good quality mw material has been estimated to be only 75,000 ton in the world .
it would also be important to develop more added-value application of chitosan so as to utilize this versatile material better .

to investigate the choice of surgical therapy for the pancreaticoduodenal region invaded by or involved in stomach carcinoma .
methods 42 patients with stomach carcinoma invaded by or involved in pancreaticoduodenal region from june 1994 to december 1999 were analyzed retrospectively .

to investigate whether enteral nutrition decreases the level of blood endotoxin in patients performed with surgeries , compared with the parenteral nutrition .
forty-one patients received major abdominal surgeries were randomized into enteral nutrition group ( n = 21 ) and parenteral nutrition group ( n = 20 ) .
on the day 1 postoperatively , the patients received either enteral nutrition or parenteral nutrition .
the level of proteins in both groups has no significant difference on day 3 and day 8 postoperatively .
alt and bilirubin had no significant changes during the period .
the level of endotoxin in enteral nutrition group increased on day 3 postoperatively , and decreased on day 8 postoperatively .
compared with the parenteral nutrition , enteral nutrition can decrease the level of blood endotoxin in patients performed with surgeries .

to study the effidency of inhaling laughing gas for labor pain relief and its effects on mother and fetus .
methods 250 primiparas were randomly divided into the observational group and the control group .

the rates of good uterine contractions in the two groups were 77.04 % and 90.98 % respectively ( p < 0.05 ) ;
the rates of postpartum haem-orrhage ( 500ml ) were 17.21 % and 3.27 % respectively ( p < 0.01 ) ,
the rates of additional oxytocin use were 13.93 % and 1.63 % respectively ( p < 0.01 ) .
the maximum additional dosage of oxytocin was 60iu ~ 80iu .

the prognostic factors include stage , pathology , tumor position , treatment method and radiotherapy dose .

by peritoneal washing chromasome- cytok3gy ( pwcc ) , the cancer cell detection rate was 21.11 % ( 19 / 90 ) .
all the pwc-positive cases were also found pwcc-positive ( 11 / 11 ) . 3 pwcc-positive cases with negative pwc died of cancer .
