to investigate maternal-fetal outcome in pregnant women complicated with congenital heart disease and the principle of management in perinatal period .
clinical data of 165 pregnant cases with congenital heart disease were analysed retrospectively .
there was one infant macrosornia in 46 cases with previous cardiac correction surgery , but sca preterm birth , mother and perinatal infant deathes were not detected .
many women with congenital heart disease can have a pregnancy .
cesarean section is the better choice of safe delivery .

we should pay attention to the monitoring of the left ventricular diastolic function of patients with cardiac function class iii ~ iv in clinical practice .
to investigate the effect of maternal docosahexaenoic acid ( dha ) on the neurodevelopmental quotient of normal term babies .
results ( 1 ) dha of maternal blood had a positive correlation with gestational weeks .
( 2 ) dha of cord blood was significantly lower than that of materal blood , and was positively correlated with that of full-term maternal blood and colostmm .
( 4 ) dha of cord blood was positively correlated with that of baby 's mdi and pdi .
( 5 ) mdi and pdi of full breast-feeding group were significantly higher than that of mixed feeding and bottle feeding groups .
dha levels of maternal blood and breast milk are closely related to the neurological development of the brain in both fetus and infants .

the 44.2 percent cases are of unexplained rsa .

and 30 cases were taken as the control .

to study the efficacy and safety of taking misoprostol suspension per os at lower dosage for inducing term labor .
otherwise , misoprostol was stopped immediately . 70 subjects of group b received intravenous oxytocin for controls .
the success rate of labor induction was 88.57 % in group a and 82.86 % in group b ( p0.05 ) .
the average interval from start of labor induction to onset of labor in group a was significantly shorter than that in group b ( p0.05 ) .
it is safe , effective and convenient to induce term labor with misopros tol suspension in lower dosage . this method was better than that of oxytocin infusion .

to investigate the influence of mifepristone on the ultrastructure of human fetal myocardial tissue .
immediately after delivery of fetus , myocardial tissue was acquired and prepared for transmission electron microscopic examination .
in comparison with the control groups , the myocardial tissue of mifepristone group displayed the following morphological changes : 1muscle cells were edematous and mitochondria were markedly swollen .
2glycogen particles were completely depleted in cytoplasm .
3in some muscle cells , myofilaments were flocky in appearance and showed no cross striations .
4in interstitium , extravasal red cells , thrombocytes and cell debris were often seen .
mifepristone can cause a hypoxic damage in the second trimester fetal myocardial tissue .

mifepristone could make decidual and chorial er and pr expression less , which perhaps could be concerned with metorrhagia long time by drug induced abortion .

the cumulative continuation rate was 88.8 and 97.0 per 100 women respectively at 12 months , there was no statistical significance ( p > 0.05 ) .
the cumulative continuation rate were 88.8 and 93.0 per l00 women at 24 months . follow-up rate was 100 % at 36 months .
the pregnancy rates were 1.0 and 3.0 per 100 women respectively and removal rates were 2.0 and 5.0 per l00 women for medical reasons .
the new design of the flaxigargd iud showed low pregnancy rate , high efficacy and high acceptabilily rate .

objectvie to study the effects of gnrha on expression of bcl-2 / bax mrna in uterine leiomyoma .

results 18 patients with various leukemia had been measured 126 times . the positive results of the patientsand the samples were 38.8 % and 15.9 % respectively .
the cytology measurement of the csf is one of the reliable methods which are used to diagnose cnsl , especially to diagnose those whose clinical symptoms are negtive .
this method is very valuable for the early diagnosis , prognostic judgement and therapeutic monitor of the cnsf .
to study the feasibility of gene diagnosis and prenatal gene diagnosis in patients with spinal muscular atrophy ( sma ) .
homozygous deletion of smn exogenote 7 was identified in 96.8 % ( 30 / 31 ) of patients with sma .

this dna analysis of smn gene may be useful for gene diagnosis and prenatal gene diagnosis of sma .

to research on lipidic metabolic relations between newborn infants and pregnant women .
order of concentrations of.serum chol , tg , apoa1 , apob was that pregnant women > umbiliacl control adults > newborn infants > umbilical cord blood .
measured results of the newborns were not affected by those of pregnant women .
concentrations of serum chol , tg , apob of the newborns varied increasingly with their days after birth , but concentration of serum apoa1 didn 't .
hyperlipidemia of pregnant women can n't reduce hypolipemia of their newborns .

to investigate the characteristics of the clinical manifestations and diagnosis of bartter 's syndrome in children .
most of children with the syndrome were male ( 66.7 % ) .
the first symptom was polyuria and polydipsia in 92.3 % of the children .
( 2 ) obvious increases of renin , angiotesin ii and aldosteron in sera , but the blood pressure was almost normal ;
( 3 ) failure to thrive was prominant ( 84.6 % ) , among them 4 children had mental retardation ;
( 4 ) comprehensive therapy with indomethacin , antisterone and potassium had remarkable effect .

to approach the characteristics of clinical , eeg and therapy on electrical status epilepticus during sleep ( eses ) .
eses is a specific eeg phenomenon rather than an independent syndrome .
long-term and continuous abnormal discharges is the main cause of impairment of higher cortical function resulted from eses .
antiepileptic therapy should not only control clinical seizures , but also inhibit epileptic discharges .

the major cost in the treatment of epilepsy was direct cost .

to evaluate the efficacy of erythropoietin in prevention and treatment of anemia of prematurity .
both these two groups had oral supplement of elemental iron 5rog kg-1 d-1 from the 15th day of life .
serum ferritin dropped more significantly in the treated group during the study period .
the need for transfusion in the treated group was significantly less than that in the control group ( p < 0.05 ) .
there were statistically significant differences between these two groups in the rate of weight gain ( p < 0.05 ) .
early administration of high dosage of rhu-epo can lighten the degree of anemia , reduce or replace the need for blood transfusion .
enough iron supplementation can increase the efficacy of rhu-epo .

to express ibdv vp2 / vp243 gene in recombinant fpv and study on the protection and immunogenieity of expressed product .

before challenge with vvibdv , the antibody level in control group were significantly higher than that in experimental group .
however , the level in experimental group was increased rapidly 5d after challenge .

some of the nonfunction adenomas had er gene expression , but their mrna expressions were not correlated with er protein expression .
other types of pituitary adenomas did not have er gene expression .

to observe the therapeutic effects and possible mechanisms of negative pressure on wound healing of deep second degree burn in pigs .
twenty-four wounds were divided into two groups : control group and experimental group . wound healing rate and dna cycle of biopsy specimens of wound were observed .
the wound healing rate were significantly increased .
the percentage of g1 phase was decreased , the percentage of s phase and g2 + m phase was increased .
it suggests that negative pressure is an effective method to enhance the wound healing of burn .
statistical analysis revealed that the difference in the degree of dermal swelling among the three groups was significant ( p < 0.01 ) .
the deeper the burn wound , the more serious the degree of dermal swelling . in third degree wounds , part of the dermo-subcutaneous interface was destroyed .
ultra-high frequency ultrasonic detection is a non-damaging , accurate and objective method for determination of burn depth . it is expected to be widely applied .

to observe the efficacy of " ploughing " therapy in treating burn wounds of different depth .
third degree wounds were treated with surgical knife , to a depth to disrupt the wounds , the pitch was 2 ~ 4 mm .
deep second degree wounds started to liquefy in 24 to 48 hours and ended in 10 days .
third degree wounds started to liquefy in 72 hours and ended in 2 weeks .
" ploughing " therapy can effectively improve local micro-circulation and promote wound healing .
the contact area between mebo and the wounds was enlarged , so that mebo could fully display its efficacy .
it created an environment for early skin grafting of third degree wounds which were unable to heal spontaneously .

sustainable agriculture is nowadays a new trend of global agriculture development , and its base is the farmland resources ' sustainable utilization .
the crux of the sandy lands in huanghuaihai plain is to develop high production , excellent quality , best efficiency and sustainable agriculture .
ecological tourism has become a new developing trend along with the fast growing of tourism .
the law on water resources must be perfected and operating .
the intensified winter monsoon events last at an average of 1.8 ~ 2.4 ka ,
tupan basin is a intermontane basin with extreme arid climate , which is sensitive for the global change .
the ecological integrity of a landscape is often threatened by economic developments . the balance between economy and ecology can be achieved through a landscape approach .
a landscape approach is to create an ecologically sound landscape with possibilities for the development of conflicting types of land use .
this involves the reallocation of land-use types in a way that adverse impacts are balanced out .
the reallocation of land-use types should correspond to the potentials of the natural physical structures .
an integrated analysis of the coupling relationship between water systems and land uses can effectively assess ecological sustainability .
it is recognized that optimal spatial arrangement of conflicting land uses may actually reduce the flood threats and minimize the water quality problems without jeopardizing the economic development .

to study the earlier and later clinic results of 64 chronic duodenal ulcer patients treated with high selective vagotomy and mucosal antrectomy ( hsv + ma ) .
to state operative details of lip-shaped hepatectomy ( lsh ) and evaluate its advantage in treatment of primary liver cancer ( plc ) .
lsh is one of the irregular hepatectomies .
the key lies in the following five operative kinks : 1adequately mobilizing perihepatic ligaments ;
2designing lip-shaped hepatic incision ; 3laying sutures on both sides of the hepatic incision for traction ;
4wedge-shapedly resecting the tumor and the surrounding liver ; 5closely sewing up the hepatic cutting surface .
the operative mortality rate was 1.2 % , 2 died of hepatic failure and 1 renal failure .
lsh is a relatively simple , safe , reasonable and recommendable hepatectomic modality .

to investigate the way to decrease the morbidity and moritality of pancreaticoduodenectomy .
the morbidity and mortality were analysed in 60 cases of pancreaticoduodenectomies from 1988 to 1998 .
the postoperative morbidity rate was 30 % ( 18 / 60 ) , including pancreatic fistula in 8 cases .
the in-hospital mortality rate was 3.3 % ( 2/60 ) .
the key points to decrease the morbidity and mortality of pancreaticoduodenectomy are delicate operative maneuver and effective perioperative treatment .
signle-layered anastomosis used in pancreatoenteric and biliary-enteric reconstruction of pancreaticoduodenectomy is an efficacious method to decrease the postoperative pancreatic and biliary fistula .
to investigate the choice of palliative operation for the carcinoma of head of pancreas ( chp ) .
the clinical data of 187 patients with chp in the last 20 years were analysed retrospectively .
the occurrence of duodenal obstruction after hdjs or cjs was 29.3 % .
as a palliative operation , roux-en-y choledochjejunostomy especially combined with preventive gastrojejunostomy synchoronsouly is strongly recommended .
a retrospective study was made on the clinical data of 1740 patients with he from 1960 to 1997 .
in this series , the complications included infection ( 61 % ) , rupture ( 11.3 % ) , inner fistula ( 21.3 % ) .
postoperative complications included biliary fistula , inner cyst infection and insufficient closing of the remaining cavity .
the curative rate by operation in this series was up to 99.4 % , while 9 cases ( 0.6 % ) died .
the major damage of he to human body is its complications .
to sum up the experience in treating 120 aortic aneurysms above the renal arteries ( aaara ) .
the clinical data of 120 patients with aaara were reviewed , including male in 97 and female in 23 .
seventy-four cases underwent surgical or endograftiing management .
postoperative 30 days mortality was 14.9 % ( 11 cases ) .
postoperative complications occurred in 9 cases , but none occurred hemiplegic paralysis , paraplegic paralysis or apoplexy .
48 patients had follow-up for 1 month to 15 years , of them , 5 cases died ( 10.4 % ) .
to inquire into the clinical effect of tamoxifen for breast hyperplasia .
levels of serum estradiol ( e2 ) and progesterone ( p ) during corpus lutein phase were tested before and after the drug treatment in two observed groups .
including tamoxifen group ( tg ) in 1820 cases and rupixiao group ( rg ) in 900 cases .
results ( 1 ) tg was better than rg in the recovery of serum e2 and p ( p < 0.01 ) ;
( 2 ) tg was superior to rg in clinical effects ;
( 3 ) rupixiao had no side effect while tamoxifen had a low incidence of slight side effect , but it could disappear after discontinue the drug ;
( 4 ) the rate of relapse was higher in rg than that in tg during the follow-ups period ( p < 0.01 ) .
to introduce the pathogenesis , pathology , diagnois and treatment of xanthogranutous cholecystitis ( xgc ) .
this paper was made on the leteralure review .
the pathogenesis of xgc was due to bile exudation to interstitial of cyst wall from reptured rokilansky-aschoff sinus or mucosa ulcer .
xgc is a special inflammatory disease of gallbladder . the treatment is cholecystectomy .
to introduce the etiology , pathogenesis , clinical manifestation , diagnosis and treatment of splenic abscess ( sa ) .
a sumarrization was made on the clinical data of 9 cases of sa who were treated by auther with leterature review .
sa could be divided to autopsy type and clinical type ,
the demonstration rate of sa was 0.4 % ~ 0.7 % in autopsy .
clinically massive solitary sa was common .
the source of infection was mamily from blood stream .
no special clinical manifestation was found in the early stage of sa .
possitive blood culture rate was 15 % ~ 70 % in sa patients . imagic examination was helpful to the diagnosis of sa .
the misdiagnosis rate of sa was as high as 22.5 % ~ 50 % , even more .
surgical treatment had good result .

aim to evaluate the application of dipstick and pcr for diagnosing falciparun malaria in outpatient clinics in endemic area .
results 112 cases with fever were examined .
the sensifivity of dipstick and pcr is 93.5 % and 83.9 % respectively , while the specificity is 95.1 % and 98.8 % respectively .
the higher the parasitemia density is , the higher the detection rate is ( x2 for trendancy p < 0.01 ) .
dipstick is much more rapid and simple than blood smear and pcr method , and is promising in endemic areas .
both dipstick and pcr should be improved to make the sensitivity higher , especially when the parasitemia densities are low .

to study the killing mechanism of the drug and affection on the contents of protein , glycogen and dna in the worm .
the measurement of glycogen was done by park and johndon methods ;
the content of dna was measured by diphenylamine staining method .
the dogs with the drug were dissected after 3 or 5 days and a lot of worms obtained , all the worms were killed .
the mean of alive time of the worm was 2.39 days in vitro . it was markedly different from the control group .
the dead worms obtained in vivo was remarkably reduced in size and weight compared with the alive worms in control group .
the size of the worm killed by the drug did not reduce in vitro , but the weight was reduced remarkably .
the measurements on the contents of protein and dna showed marked differences among the groups with the drug in vivo or in vitro and the control group .
the content of glycogen of the worm reduced in the group with the drug in vivo , but there was no distinctive differences in the group in vitro .
the triclabendazole was effective against p.westermani in vitro and in vivo .

to study the association and the effect of the expression of p16 and p53 protein on the occurence and development of gallbladder carcinoma .
the expression of p16 and p53 protein were detected in 40 cases of gallbladder carcinoma with immunohistochemical method .
to study the relation between retinoblastoma ( rb ) gene expression and biological characteristics of gallbladder carcinoma .
the rate of positive staining was 58.7 % in gallbladder carcinoma which was significantly lower than that in cholecystitis and gallbladder papilloma ( 100 % ) .
it sugests that expression or non-expression of rb gene is closely related to the malignant potential invasiveness and prognosis of gallbladder carcinoma .
to discuss the relationship between the efficiency of bile duct drainage and the postoperative liver functional recovery and the prognosis of hilar cholangiocarcinoma .
the liver function in bilateral drainage group was nearly normal within 6 weeks after operation .
the differences of perioperative complication rate and mortality of the two groups showed no significance .
this suggests that et is tightly related with the pathologic process of acst .
the usefulness of measurement of nuclear dna content elevation for diagnosis of early hepatocellular carcinoma was evaluated by a study of 186 patients with liver cirrhosis .
results 1hepatocellular carcinoma was found in 37 patients during 10 years follow-up , the cumulative incidence of hepatocellular carcinoma was 19.89 % .
it is important that measurement of 5cer join with afp in cirrhotic patients monitored for early development of hepatocellular carcinoma .
expression of cd15 was significantly correlated with bcl-2 .
expression of cd15 and bcl-2 can be regarded as a parameter to evaluate tumor metastasis and prognosis of thyroid cancer .
verapamil and energy compouds have protective effects on the functions and ultrastructures of the i/r of small intestine .
after rats were fasted for 24 hours a little gastric juice was aspirated .
these suggest that on stress gastric mucosa bleeding is related with decreased gastric juice ph , decreased pgs and increase acth .
to control stress ulcer , ph of gastric juice and amount of pgs should be increased .
losec can increase gastric juice ph , so losec is the first choice to control stress ulcer .
to study the relationship between expression of nm23 , cd44 in gastric carcinoma and lymph-node metastasis and prognosis .
the incidences of nm23 , cd44h and cd44v6 protein positivity in gastric carcinoma were 44.8 % , 54.3 % and 48.6 % respectively .
the reactivity to these three antibodies were correlate with metastasis of lymph nodes ( p0.01 for cd44v6 and p0.05 for nm23 , cd44h ) .
the result of southern blot hybridization with pw2.2 as a probe showing that this fragment was also found in some other gastric adenocarcinoma samples .
ap-pcr fingerprinting assay can be used to identify and clone the variant genes associated with gastric adenocarcinoma .

the detection of cyclind1 gene and its protein in breast cancer has some clinical significances .

the serum concentration of amylase increased markedly in ahnp rats , and there was a significant difference between ahnp and aep ( p0.01 ) .
to investigate the surgical technique of reduced sized liver transplantation .
a reduced size liver transplantation was successfully performed on a 11-year old girl with incurable caroli 's disease .
the recovery of liver graft function was good after the operation in this patients without complications .
to investigate the expression of intercellular adhesion molecules-1 ( cd54 ) in rectal carcinoma and nearby mucous membrane and its clinical significance .
cd54 is highly expressed in both the rectal carcinoma and the mucous membrance 2cm distal away from the lesions .
cd54 may be used as an important clinical tumor marker for rectal carcinoma and the mucous membrance 2cm away from the lesions may have the tendency for malignancy .

to evaluate the value of bile and serum ca19-9 in diagnosing biliary tract carcinoma .

the corresponding indexes of serum cea were 68.57 % and 82.97 % .

to sum up experiences in diagnosis and treatment for hash i moto 's disease ( hd ) .
clinical records of 78 patients who underwent operations and were diagnosed as hashimoto 's disease by histologic examination in our hospital from jan .
1988 to dec . 1998 were analyzed . results seventy females and 8 males , aged 9 to 70 years ( average of 41.6 years ) .
hd was coexistent with 10 . 3 % of thyroid gland malignant tumor , 23.1 % of adenoma and 30.8 % of other thhroid gland diseases .
the misdiagnosis rate was 35.9 % and missed diagnosis rate was 46.2 % .
to study the change of immunologic function of the patient with obstructive jaundice .
the level of the sil-2r , tnf- , il-6 and il-8 in 36 cases of obstructive jaundice before operation was higher than normal control group ( p0.01 ) .
it decreased after the obstruction was removed , and it was close to normal control on 14th day after operation .
the result suggest that relief of jaundice could improve the immunologic function of the patient .
to study the value of intraperitoneal chemotherapy in the treatment of gastrointestinal malignancies .
the current literature on intraperitoneal chemotherapy was reviewed .
following intraperitoneal injection , the concentration of drugs in the peritoneum and in the portal vein was high , lasting and sustained .
early post-operative chemotherapy showed better results .
port-a-cath provides a safe and suitable drug delivery system .
complications were mild .
to provide a current language for clinical and pathological discription of gastric cancer .
the literature in recent years on the distribution of lymph nodes and staging of gastric cancer were reviewed .
the excellent outcome of surgery will be achieved by the effective dissection and removel of lymph nodes in gastric cancer .
to review recent studies in molecular biology of gastric cancer .
relevant references were reviewed .
gastric cancer is related to much mutation of genes .
to review the studies on oddi 's sphincter motility in recent years .
endoscopic manometry was the gold standard for distinguishing normal motility from the abnormal .
some surgeries and drugs could lead to the sphincter of oddi dysfunction .
the sphincter of oddi dysfunction can be treated with endoscopic sphincterotomy .
preservation of sphincter function is stressed in surgery .

b7-1 and il-12 gene transfer could remarkably promote immunogenicity of hepatocellular carcinoma cells and induce strong specific and nonspecific immunity against hepatocellular carcinoma in vitro .
seventeen and 24 patients with phc were treated , respectively by pai or by pei in our hospital .

to sum up experiences in diagnosis and treatment for thyroid malignancy .
there were 1 male and 7 females with average age of 37.6 years .
the incidence of hashimoto 's disease associated with thyroid cancer and malignant lymphoma were 7.7 % and 2.6 % , respectively .
no operative mortality and complication was found .
hashimoto 's disease is not uncommon . the combined thyroid cancer is small with papillary carcinoma predominance and the prognosis is good .
if it is complicated with malignant lymphoma , the thyroid is rapidly enlarged with pain and dyspnea .

hsps was a kind of stress protein induced after cell was sitmulated by the stress . it could improve body 's tolerance to tough situation .
to study the epidemiologic characteristics of primary liver cancer ( plc ) .
the literatures about regional distribution and etiologic epidemiology of plc were reviewed .
plc was mainly distributed on caostland in the south-east of china . the main cause of plc was hepatitis b virus , aflatoxin and contamination of drinking water .
otherwise , pls was also related with lack of some trace element , sex horemones , genealogy cause and so on .
the genesis of plc was by multiple factors .
the effects of endotoxin , cytokines , nitric oxide were reviewed in the development of hyperdynamic circulatory syndrome in portal hypertension .
liceratures of overseas main studies in hyperdynamic circulatory syndrome of portal hypertension in recent 10 years were reviewed .
the hyperdynamic circulatory syndrome was found in 30 % -50 % of patients with cirrhosis and in all animal models of portal hypertension .
the research results of the effects of endotoxin , cytokines , nitric oxide in the development of hyperdynamic circulatory syndrome were different .
hyperdynamic circulatory syndrome contribute to the maintenance and aggregation of portal hypertension .
to search for the significant gene indicators in the diagnosis of pancreatic cancer .
literatures about genetic diagnosis of pancreatic cancer were collected and reviewed .
k-ras , p53 , dpc4 and telomerase genes were considered to play important roles in the diagnosis of pancreatic cancer .
detection of the genes related to pancreatic cancer may be of helpful in early diagnosis of pancreatic cancer .
to study the advances in microcirculation after islets of langerhans transplantation ( ilt ) .
the literature in the recent years on the study of the relationship between ilt and microcirculation was reviewed .
freely transplanted islet grafts were revascularized from the host-derived microvascular bed .
the interstitial pressure in the islet transplants was markedly lower than the capillary pressure . there were clearly differences in microcirculation between syngeneic and xenogeneic islet grafts .
to provide experimental evidence for the clinical application of ischemia therapy to treating pancreatic cancer .
compared to that of normal rats , the serum level of il-10 and tgf- in 24 hours of acute pancreatitis increased significantly ( p < 0.05 ) .

to evaluate the activity of the pancreatic tissue phospholipase a2 ( pla2 ) in acute pancreatitis ( ap ) and the therapeutic effects of verapamil in rats .
tgf- 1 staining was observed in the granulation tissue , fibroblasts and endothelial cells of blood vessels .
high expression of tgf- 1 was observed in the healing process lasting for a long time .
the high expression of tgf- 1 is related closely with the fibroblast proliferating activity , extracellular matrix overdeposition and scar proliferation in the healing process of bile duct .
to discuss the diagnosis and treatment of insulinoma , clinical characteristics and summarize our experiences .
all 15 patients recieved surgical treatment . fourteen patients were cured and the 15th patient died from hepatic failure six months later .
insulinoma should be diagnosed and treated as early as possible . it can be cured by resection of the tumor .

to evaluate the diagnostic value of magnetic resonance cholangiopancreatography ( mrcp ) in obstructive jaundice .
different causes of obstruction had their own characteristic manifestations . level of obstruction was accurate in 100 % , the accuracy in distinguishing obstructive causes was 93.8 % .
mrcp is quite effective , safe and reliable in diagnosis of obstructive jaundice .

a retrospective study was made on clinical data of 58 triplex operation patients suffering from portal hypertension and upper digestive tract bleeding .
postoperative portal pressure was 25 ~ 43cmh2o ( preoperative portal pressure 27 ~ 45cmh2o ) with the average reduction of 8cmh2o .
owing to cerebrovascular disease 1 patient died .
2 patients suffered from mild hepatoencephalopathy and was ameliorated through conservative treatment .
lymphatic fistula occurred in 3 patients who recovered without treatment 5,10 days and 3 months after operation respectively .
41 patients were followed up for 1 month to 6 years and found no rebleeding or hepatoencephalopathy occurrence .
disappearance of hypersplenism was found in all patients ;
ascites was disappearred in 20 cases , significant reduce in 10 cases ;
liver function was improved in 10 cases , deteriorated in 3 , without remarkable changes in 28 .
the artificial vessels unblocking detected by b type ultrasonography and doppler sonography in 40 cases .
intrahepatic portal hypertension with rebleeding after treatment of splenectomy or without operation , and the patients with liver function in child a orb class .
to observe the effect of combination of splenocaval shunt with portaazygous devascularization for portal hypertension with upper digestive tract hemorrage .
a retrospective summary was made on 56 cases of portal hypertension with hemorrhage treated by the combined operation .
resultsthere was no rebleeding at the early stage of postoperation in the series with operative mortality 3.6 % .
the incidence of long-term rebleeding and hepatic encephalopathy was 4.1 % and 2.0 % respectively .
postoperative survival rates of 1,3,5and 10years were 98.1 % , 93.9 % , 82.5 % and 66.7 % respectively .
including child a in 13 cases , child bin 5 and child c in 2 .
the patients ' average age was 43.4 years old .
postoperative color doppler-ultrasonography and angiography showed that hepatopetal blood flow was no changes after operation . the patent rate of shunt was of 90 % .

of the 58 cases , 7 were treated by non-operative management ;
51 by surgery , including emergent operation in 19 , elective operation in 32 .

to evaluate the major prognostic factors in hepatocellular carcinoma ( hcc ) subsequent to radical resection .
in this series , the survival rates of 1,3 and 5 years were 89.73 % , 54.08 % and 29.12 % respertively .
the most signficant prognostic factors were tumor thrombus in the portal vein , c-myc gene expression and tumor without capsule .
the survival prediction equation was x2 = 53.281 p < 0.001 .
a five-year survival rates was significants different ( p < 0.05 ) among patients in low , intermediate and high risk group divided by prognostic index .
to investigate the preoperative diagnosis and surgical treatment of primary liver sarcoma .
the clinical data of 14 cases of primary liver sarcoma were retrospectively analysed .
all cases were misdiagnosed before operation .
the average survival time was 6 month .
surgical resection was performed on only 3 cases with survival time were 4 years , 6 months , 3 months respectively .
for the patients with a biopsy only , the longest survival time was 4 months with average of 1.5 months .
the preoperative diagnosis of liver sarcoma is difficult with high misdiagnosis rate , and the prognosis is poor .
to explore the values of color doppler in predicting the safety of hepatectomy for hepatic cancer .
test data of both preoperative and postoperative hepatic function and color doppler in 30 patients with hepatic cancer were analysed .
to report the clinical course and long-term management of a patient with living related liver transplantation .
the recipient was a 10-year old girl .
the donor was the patient 's father aged 40 years . the left lateral lobe of donor 's liver was cut and grafted to the recipient orthotopicallg .
intensive care and treatment as well as long-term follow-up were made after operation .
for the donor , the operation lasted 400min with bleeding of 410ml and 300g liver removed .
the donor recovered successfully . for the recipient , the operation lasted 652min with bleeding of 1665ml .
the non-liver period lasted 80min , warm ischemic period was not happened and cold ischemic period of graft was 137min .
the patient has been surviving 2.5 years with normal liver function .
to investigate the hemodynamic changes and clinical significance of combination of portal azygous devascularization with mesocaval shunt ( combined operation ) .
retrospective study was made on 100 patients who underwent the combined operation in 1980 ~ 1995 in our hospital .
acute bleeding in all patients was stopped in a short period postoperatively and no rebleeding occurred in early or late stages .
a postoperative mean fpp level was 25.09 3.1cmh2o , which can maintain a high level of hepatopetal portal flow and reduce the occurrence of encephalopathy .
to investigate the preventive measures and the diagnosis and treatment of iaotrogenic bile duct injury .
the clinical data of 91 cases of iatrogenic bile duct injury had been analysed retrospectively .
results 103 operations were performed on 91 patients .
8 of them underwent second operation . 2 underwent third operation .
70 patients were followed up and 90 % of them had a good result .
cholecystectomy as a leading cause of iaotrogenic bile duct injury can be avoided .
hepaticojejunostomy is preferable procedure in the repairment and reconstruction of bile duct injury , especially in serious damage with traumatic stricutre .
to evaluate the effect of surgery in the treatment of hepatolithiasis .
assessment of the problems concerning surgical treatment in hepatolithiasis .
and conclusions ( 1 ) cholangiography was adopted to know about the location and extension of hepatolithiasis before operation ;
( 3 ) intraoperative ultrasounography , cholangiography and cholangioscopy are useful to find and manage the residual stones ;
( 5 ) generally stage operation should be considered , if the patient is complicated with portal hypertension .
to study the effect of the hepatic segmental resection ( hsr ) with combined operation for hepatobiliary calculus .
no death occurred in this series .
76 cases were followed up after operation from 2 to 8 years , residual calculus rate was 5.88 % , symptoms recurrence rate 1.33 % .
no one was re-operated .
to summarize the experience of surgical treatment of intrahepatic gallstones .
analysis of the clinical data of 168 patients with intrahepatic gallstones was made retrospectively .
of the 168 cases , hepatectomy was proformed on 62 cases ( 36.9 % ) , 93.5 % of the patients showed excellent or good result ;
roux-en-y cholangiojejunostomy on 44 cases ( 26.2 % ) , 86.4 % of the patients had excellent or good result ;
to evaluate the role of choledochoscopy in selecting operation procedure for hepatolithiasis .
experience in choledochoscopy applied in 618 cases of hepatolithiasis was summerised .
( 2 ) perform hepatolobectomy for tubiform stenoses in hepatic duct ;
( 3 ) perform dilation with choledochoscopy for membraniform stenoses in hepatic duct ;
( 4 ) perform inner drainage for impassability in inferior extremity of common bile duct ;
( 5 ) external drainage must be selected or added if calculi can n't be extracted completely ;
( 6 ) perform hepatocholangioplasty for obvious stenoses in left or right hepatic duct .
calculi extraction with conventional appliances had a residual stone rate of 78.3 % ( 263 / 336 ) ;
but the rate declined to 25.9 % ( 87 / 336 ) after the use of intra-operative choledochoscopy and systemic therapy including post-operative choledochoscopy ;
the final residual stone rate was 2.8 % ( 17 / 618 ) after postoperative choledochscopic treatment .
choledochoscopy benefits the proper choice of operation for hepatolithiasis . it helps not only to discover and get rid of focal lesion effectively but also simplifies the operation .
to study the etiology , therapy and prevention of hepatolithiasis associated with intrahepatic cholangiocarcinoma ( hlaihcc ) .
a retrospectively study was made on clinical manifestation of 6 patients with hlaihcc in two hospitals from march 1986 to june 1997 .
the main clinical manifestations of hlaihcc were charcot syndrome .
all the places had stones where the cancer occurred .
pathologically , all of the hlaihccs were adenocarcinoma .
of them , 5 cases died within 1 year .
to evaluate the availability of the biliointestinal internal drinage operation ( biido ) as a primary procedure for choledocholithiasis .
for those patients with choledocholithiasis , if their cbd diamter beyond 1.5cm , the biido as a primary procedure should be considered .
to study the changes of cholesterol metabolism in gallstone formation in the rabbit .
glycocholate ( gca ) in bile in 3 and 4 weeks groups decreased significantly ( p < 0.05 ) .
it is suggested that various steps of cholesterol metabolism play a role in gallstone formation .
to detect bile anaerobic bacteria and their actiones in patients with gallstone .
anaerobic bile culture was done by automatic detection system in 67 gallstone patients with cholecystectomy .
there may have some connection between anaerobic infection and gallstone formation .
the patients with obligate anaerobic bacteria positive only have a long term history of chronic cholecystitis and display no improvement of the clinical symptoms by antimicrobile treatments .
to study the mechanisms of protective effect of mild hypothermia on hepatic ischemia-reperfusion ( i-r ) injury .
mild hypothermia may enhance liver ability of oxidation-resistance , and reduce the oxygen free radical injury to liver after ischemia-reperfusion .
to explore the treatment of abdominal aortic aneurysm ( aaa ) by endoulminal vascular technique .
to summarize the experience in diagnosis and treatment for the papilla of vater in diverticula of duodenum .
diagnosis and treatment were retrospectively reviewed for 24 patients with papilla of vater in diverticula . effects of different procedures were compared .
the first choice of diagnosis measures was hypotonicity duodenum barium meal photography , ercp , ct and cholangiography .
the long-term effect of opening diverticula plus oddi 's sphincteroplasty was excellent .
the hypotonicity duodenum barium meal photography , ercp , ct and cholangiography have high diagnosis rate .
in patients without constrictive papillitis , the effect of digastive tract or biliary duct bypass technique is good ;
in patients with constrictive papillitis , although the methods of openning the diverticula with sphincterplasty of oddi is complex , the best long-term effect could be expected .

of 56 patients whose shock uncorrected before operation , but an operation was performed immediatly .
in this group 31 patients with one organ involved , no death occurred ;
of 58 patients with two organs involved , 1 ( 1.7 % ) died ;
to evaluate the therapeutic effect of hepatic resection for hepatolithiasis .
left hepatolithiasis was the most common form ( 165 cases ) ; left lateral lobectomy and left hepatectomy were most commonly performed procedures ( 153 cases ) .
postoperative complications occurred in 32 patients ( 17.39 % ) and no operative mortality .
hepatic resection is an effective procedure for hepatolithiasis .

to investigate the optimal treatment for severe acute pancreatitis ( sap ) .
a retrospective study was made on the clinical data of 88 patients with sap .
to expore the proper treatment of severe acute pancreatitis ( sap ) .
the effect of 107 patients with sap treated by non-operation or operation was retrospectively analysed .
results 98 ( 91.6 % ) out of 107 cases were cured and 9 ( 8.4 % ) died .
34 cases were treated by early operations , 4 died of postoperative complications .
to study the timing and procedure of operation for severe acute pancreatitis ( sap ) .
the clinical data of 78 cases of sap was analysed retrospectively .
the operation consisted of cholecystectomy , choledochostomy , jejunostomy and great omentum resection ;
the pancreas was not operated . all of the patients survived .
( 2 ) no-operation group : 11 patients without any liquid in abdomen were treated with non-operation treatment . all of the 11 patients survived .
the surgical treatment should be performed on the sap patient with abdominal blood liquid , but the pancreas should not be operated to keep the integrity of pancreas .
to investigate the effects of early operation and continuous irrigation of peritoneal cavity for severe acute pancreatitis ( sap ) .
retrospective analysis was made on the clinical features , operative procedures , method of peritoneal cavity irrigation , and therapeutic effect in 55 patients with sap .
the average time stayed in hospital of these patients was 39d 8d .
early operation and coninuous irrigation of peritoneal cavity may decrease the mortality , shorten the course and increase the therapeutic effect of sap .
to evaluate the optimal timing of operation for severe gallstone pancreatitis ( sgp ) .
the operation timing , morbidity and mortality of 67 cases of sgp were retrospectively analysed .
to study the relationship between anomalous junction of pancreaticobiliary duct ( ajpbd ) and pancreatitis .
the data of cholangiography , pancreatic histology and ultrastructure examination , serum and bile amylase measurement were analysed retrospectively .
microscopically , there were cells infiltration and / or fibrosis in the pancreas . electromicroscopic examination showed various degrees of ultrastructural pathological changes .
the serum and bile amylase levels and incidence of pancreatitis in the ajpbd patients were higher than those in control group ( p < 0.05 ) .
ajpbd are closely associated with pancreatitis .
the pancreatitis caused by ajpbd evolves slowly .

to study the hemorrheologic alternation in acute necrotizing pancreatitis ( anp ) and its effect in deterioating of anp .
blood samples were obtained from anp rats for hemorrheologic examination and erythrocyte osmotic fragility test . pancreatic tissue was obtained for pathological study .
in anp rats , hemorrheology is altered significantly , which may be one of the important factors in deterioraton the disease .
to study the protective effect of radix angelicae sinensis on renal damage in acute hemorrhagic necrotizing pancreatits ( ahnp ) rats .
methods 45 sd rats were randomly divided into 4 groups : 1 normal control group ( nc group , n = 10 ) ;
2 anp group ( n = 10 ) ;
3 normal saline treatment control group ( anp + ns group , n = 10 ) ;
4 lidocaine and anisodamine treatment group ( anp + la group , n = 15 ) .
serum amylase , pla2 , endotoxin were examined , and pathology of related organs as well as observed .
pathological damage of multiple organs in anp + la group was significantly milder than those in anp group and anp + ns group .
to explore the effect of low molecular weight heparin ( lmwh ) for acute hemorrhagic necrotizing pancreatitis ( ahnp ) .
the sr in tg was obviorsly higher than those in cg ( p < 0.01 ) ;
serum levels of tnf , ams , txb2 , no , sod and mda in tg were obviously lower than those in cg ( p < 0.01 ) .
to investigate the expression and clinical significance of ck20 mrna in peripheral blood of colorectal cancer patients .
ck20 mrna expression showed in 20 colorectal carcinoma tissues , but none in 20 normal persons ' blood samples .
using ck20 mrna as a target gene to examine the present of colorectal cancer cell in peripheral blood has sensitivity and specificity .
to introduce the present state of vascular gene treatment of ischemic limb .
this paper was made on the literature review .

to investigate the value of genetic diagnosis of familial adenomatous polyposis ( fap ) .
to scrutinize the effect of p53 expression in the evaluation of prognosis of breast cancer ( bc ) .
results 22 of 73 patients ( 30.1 % ) with bc had positive expression of p53 protein .
there were no relationship between positive expression of p53 protein with tumor type , metastasis of lymph nodes , recurrence and survival rate in this series .
p53 abnormal expression has no relation to the prognosis of bc.p53 protein expression may be an early manifestation of bc .
to study the effective diagnosis and treatment of pancreatic pseudocyst ( ppc ) .
the clinical data of 105 patients with ppc were retrospectively analysed .
percutaneous tube drainage was performed on 20 patients and recurrence of cyst was found in 5 cases .
surgical procedures were carried out on 53 patients , 30 by roux-en-y cystoenterostomy with 3 recurrence of cyst on follow-up ;
9 by cystogastrostomy , two had postoperative gastirc bleeding and one of the two patients died ;
8 by external drainage , 1 patient died of infection , two had pancreatic fistula , and two had recurrence of cyst ;
6 by partial pancreatectomy with 2 pancreatic leakage postoperatively .

to study the diagnosis and treatment of duodenal rupture in severe multiple injuries .
the clinical data of 26 patients with duodenal rupture in severe multiple injuries were retrospectively analysed .
of the 26 cases , 21 patients were diagnosed and 5 patients maldiagnosed preoperatively .
seven patients ( 26.9 % ) died while nineteen ( 73.9 % ) were cured in this series .
correct treatment and appropriate operation are essential for duodenal rupture in severe multiple injuries .
to improve the accuracy of early diagnosis and choose suitable management for duodenal injury .
clinical data of 40 patients with duodenal injury treated from january , 1990 to december , 1999 were studied retrospectively .
of the 40 patients , 32 ( 80 % ) had multiple injuries .
the causes of injury were mainly crush and hit , accounting for 82.5 % of all .
the main complications were duodenal fistula and intra-abdominal abscess .
early diagnosis and treatment in time for duodenal injury are very important .
the primary repair and roux-en-y duodenojejunostomy and cogbill 's or modified cogbill 's techniques for duodenal diverticularizations are practical in the operation management .
to study the choice of operation for colon injury .
retrospective analysis was made on the clinical data of 78 patients with colon injury treated by surgery .
of the 78 patients , 7 patients had colon injury only , 71 had combined injuries .
in 63 patients ( 80.7 % ) treated by one-stage operation , postoperative intestinal fistula ( if ) occurred in 1 patient ;
62 patients were curred while 1 died . in 15 patients ( 19.3 % ) treated by two-stage operation , postoperative if occurred in 1 patient ;
to summarrize the experience in diagnosis of traumatic diaphragmatic hernia and investigate a method for improving the early diagnostic rate .
the clinical data of forty-four cases of traumatic diaphragmatic hernia were restropectively analysed .
results 16 cases ( 36.36 % ) were preoperatively diagnosed , 28 cases ( 63.64 % ) maldiagnosed , including 4 cases of maldiagnosis during explore laporatomy .
32 cases ( 72.73 % ) were cured and 12 ( 27.27 % ) died .
conclutions traumatic diaphragmatic hernia is easy to be misdiagnosed preoperatively . the causes of misdiagnosis including : ( 1 ) lack of the knowledge of the disease ;
( 2 ) lack of special symptoms of the disease .
so increasing knowledge and dynamic observation of the disease as well as an analysis of its clinical manifestation dialectically are important for improving the early diagnosis .
b ultrasonography , artificial pneumoperitoneum examination and thoracoscopy are benefitial to help correct diagnosis .
to explore an effective way for diagnosis and nonoperative therapy of blunt abdominal injury ( bai ) .
selective arteriography ( sag ) and selective artery embolism ( sae ) were applied in 51 cases of bai .
sag is valiable for diagnosis of bai , especially for those unable to be diagnosed with other examinations .
to study the alternative relationship between systemic oxygen delivery ( do2 ) and oxygen consumption ( vo2 ) in rats with hemorrhagic shock .
the existence of vo2 depending on do2 indicates that body tissue is in hypoxia .

to assess the relationship of adhesion molecule expression with the biological behavior of primary hepatocellular carcinoma ( hcc ) .
in non-tumor hepatocytes , positive expression of e-cadherin was found , but cd54 and cd44 staining were negative .
cd54 and cd44 expression revealed no obvious relation with differertiation of tumor ( p > 0.05 ) , but had relation with metastasis ( p < 0.05 ) .
e-cadherin expression was strongly correlated with both tumor differentiation and metastasis ( p < 0.05 ) .
pcna proliferation index was correlated to e-cadherin expression , but revealed no correlation to cd54 and cd44 expression .
adhesion molecules cd54 , cd44 and e-cadherin can be used as indices for evaluation of the biological behavior of hcc .

to study a new continuous expansion procedure for short therapy period .
117 cases of patients with skin cicatrix were divided into intermittent fast tissue expansion group ( ifte ) and short period tissue expansion group ( spte ) .
in ifte group , expanders were placed into subcutaneous pockets through traditional parallel incisions and rapidly inflated 10 days after expander insertion .
in spte group , expanders were placed into subcutaneous pockets through short perpendicular incisions and inflated interaoperatively .
average expansion time of 16.8 days was achieved in ifte group , against 11.7 days in spte group .
average hospitalization duration was 45.3 days in ifte group , against 32.4 days in spte group .
the complication rate in spte group was lower than that of ifte group .
the procedure of shotr of short continuous tissue expansion could decrease the hospitalization time of patienst effectively with good clinic results .

conjoint nerve root ( cr ) between the two cervical dosal roots were found on 77.9 % of the specimens .
according to the diameter of cr , it was divided into proximal type , middle type and distal type ;
according to the diameter of cr , it was divided into three types : branch of rootlet , rootlet and subbundle of rootlet .
the dorsal roots were divided into 4 ~ 6 subbundles in general spr , while 8 ~ 10 rootlets in hyperselective posterior rhizotomy .
furthermore , cr of cervical dorsal roots were observed and classified and its effect on spr was also stressed .

two pairs of primer were synthesized on the basis of the dna sequence from sta 58kda group-specific antigen gene .
one of 29 ( 3.45 % ) blood clots and one of 112 ( 0.98 % ) spleen tissue from field rats were positive for 88bp dna fragment .
eight dna extracts from 39 ( 20.5 % ) chigger mites produced the predicted dna fragment .
the specimens of both blood clots and spleen tissues from the mice at day 3 of postinfection showed negative to the specific pcr product .
but positive at day 6 and 9 . conclusion : npcr has high sensitivity and specificity .

in order to explore the relationship between meteorological factors and cardio-cerebral-vascular diseases .
the risk of myocardial infarction was increased when the amplitude of daily pressure raised larger than 5 mmhg ( p = 0.02 ) ;
on the contrary , the risk of cerebral hemorrhage was increased when amplitude of daily atmospheric pressure reduce larger than 5 mmhg ( p = 0.011 ) ;
different from them , either the high atmospheric pressure or the low atmospheric pressure was the risk factor of cerebral-vascular infarction .
the incidence of cordial-cerebral-vascular diseases were related to the meteorological factors . high atmospheric pressure , high wind speed and low temperature were risk factors to chd .

aim : to evaluate the cost-utility of cefepime vs ceftazidime for medium and severe pneumonia .

cefepime therapy can save about 3 800 yuan rmb per patient in the medical expenditure .
intravenous instillation of cefepime is more cost-effective than ceftazidime in the treatment of patients with medium or severe pneumonia .

the potency of allopregnanolone in the picrotoxin seizure test was 0.123 mg.kg-1 , with 95 % confidence interval range from 0.058 to 0.263 mg.kg-1 .

kg-1 and benazepril of 1 mg

kg-1 was much lower than those in the benazepril and control groups .

kg-1 sterile amniotic fluid via lingualis vena .

moreover , this anti_invasion and migration activity of ucn_01 was associated with an up_regulation of cell adhesion molecule e_cadherin .
these results indicate for first time that ucn_01 inhibits the invasion and migration of human prostate cancer cells .
to study the protective effect of total extract of astragalus ( tea ) on primary rat hepatocytes injured by ccl4 or h2o2 and its mechanism .
the results suggest that tea possess direct protective action on primary hepatocyte in vitro injured by ccl4 or h2o2 . these might be associated with its anti_oxidative activity .
tiaxiongbushen oral liquid is valuable in treatment of human impotence and prolongation of life span .

perfusing isolated heart with rh 0.34 mol .
to research the protective effect and mechanisms of taurine on myocardial ischemia and reperfusion injury in rats .
the rat models of niddm were made . the glut4 mrna expression in skeletal muscle was observed with northern blot method .
the serum insulin was determined by radioimmunoassay .
the change of insulin positive cell in islet was observed by immunohistochemistry .
the glut4 mrna expression in skeletal muscle in niddm rats was decreased to 45 % of that in normal rats ( p < 0.01 ) .
the relative bioavailability of domestic ibudilast sustained release capsules in healthy volunteers was observed .
ibudilast concentration in plasma was determined by hplc method .
to construct the general administrative aptitude test ( gaat ) for the government functionary .
reliability and validity of the gaat were examined by test-retest , group comparison , correlation and factor analyses .
the overall difficulty of the test was 0.538 , the discrimination of all items was over 0.20 .
there were two main factors revealed by factors analysis of the subscales , and four main factors by factor analysis of subtests .
there was obvious correlation between the gaat and caitg .
the structure of the gaat is reasonable , and its reliability and validity meet the need of psychometrics .
the fbg level in stz mice was elevated by stress , while the fins level was not increased .
economic status and cost played an important role in the quality of life of cancer patients .
to explore the effect of sleep deprivation on blood corpuscle and immunity .
the blood corpuscle and immunity of 20 healthy male adults was tested during and after 56 hours of sleep deprivation .
after 56 hours of sleep deprivation , increase in counts of wbc granulocytes and rbc ( p < 0.005 ) were found .
to study the cultural schema of chinese schizophrenic 's memory model and attributional tendency .
significant interaction between attribution and gender , and between gender , cartoon types , and attribution were found .
the attribution model of schizophrenics was the same as nonschizophrenics .
there existed differences in postsensory cognitive processing impairment between males and females , with more serious impairment in the female group .
to examine relationships between ways of coping and personality traits .
some of the test-retest reliability coefficients for wcrs were significantly lower than those for personality traits .
the use of ways of coping is associated with personality characteristics .
patterns of coping could change as time goes on , and therefore would not show more cross-situational consistency as personality traits .
to establish chinese norms and factor structure of panss in schizophrenic patients .
the panss raw scores were transferred into t score and percentile .
principal component analysis was used to examine the factor structure .
the five-factor model was supported by existing research , showing good consistency and interpretability .
to assess the reliability and validity of cognitive abilities screening instrument c-2.0 ( casi c-2.0 ) .
807 persons aged from 55 to 100 years were evaluated with casi c-2.0 .
casi c-2.0 has excellent reliability . on validity , comparing with mmse , casi c-2.0 has a better specificity , and a same sensitivity .
casi c-2.0 has excellent reliability and validity . it is worthy to be applied for both clinical and epidemiological surveys

no significant correlation was found between adolescents ' pessimistic attribution and parental overprotection .

correlational analysis was applied for examining reliability and internal consistency .
for all items , the values of kappa for inter-rater reliability were above 0.75 ( p < 0.05 ) .
adas was useful as a clinical instrument to evaluate the severity of alzheimer 's disease .

data from 20 patients who diagnosed as having intractable temporal epilepsy by eeg and mr and received sle were analyzed retrospectively .
follow-up results demonstrated that satisfactory outcomes were obtained in all of these cases .

a computer software has been provided for simplifing the calculation in the applying of this method .
in this paper , the authors evaluated the clinical features and therapeutic methods for patients with intracranial hemangiob lastomas .
intracranial hemangioblastomas occurred more often in men than in women .
most of the tumors were located in cerebellum and the cystiform tumors we re most common in this series of patients .
both the ct and mri are helpful to diagnosis of this disease .
it is important to remove all the tumor nodes during the surgery in order to prevent its relapsing .

to investigate the diagnosis and treatment of patients with intracranial cavernous hemangioma .
clinical data obtained from 16 cases of intracranial cavernous hemangiomas were analyze d and summarized .
the tumors were divided into three types : 1hemisphere type , 9 patients , their chief complaints were epilepsy ;
2middle cranial fossa type , 5 patients , their chief complaints were impairment of vision and abnormal movement of eyeball ;
3cerebellum type , 2 patients , their complaints were headache and vomiting .
ct scans showed the tumors were round or nearly round masses with high blood supply , but on angiogram examination the tumor 's blood supply was hardly found .
mr was helpful to make a correct diagnosis .
the purpose of this study was to see whether there was a significant loss of forebrain cholinergic neurons after experimental diffuse brain injury ( dbi ) .
morphological studies of cholinergic neurons were performed in serial sections using acetylcholinesteras e ( ache ) histochemistry staining method .
in comparism with the control group , the number of cholinerginc neurons was significantly decrease d in all the rats with dbi ( p < 0.01 ) .
decrease in the basal forebrain cholinegic neurons is probably one of the important patholgical changes in cognitive dysfunction after diffuse brain injury .
the authors pointed out that there were a lot of factors being related to the secondary damage to brain tissues after traumatic injures .
among these the disturbance of the mitochondria function might play an important role in the formation and evolution of brain edema .
objectives to analyse the possible causes of acute hydrocephalus occured early after operation for posterior cranial fossa tumors and evaluate the measures for prevention of this complication .
objectives to investigate the changes of tcd in patients with brain injuries and its relationship to the ct , gcs and outcomes of these patients .
the incidence and the degree of vasospasm were significantly higher in the severely injured group than that in those whose brain injury was relatively mild .
the significant negative corelation was present between tcd changes and ct findings ( p < 0.01 ) 6 ~ 8 , 13 ~ 15 days after brain injury .
to study the variations of interleukin-6 ( i l-6 ) in serum and cerebrospinal fluid ( csf ) of patients following severe brain in juries .
the increase in il-6 level was more marked in csf than that in the serum , and was closely correlated with the severity of the injury .
the il-6 level both in the csf and serum was significantly increased in patients with severe brain in jury .
the il-6 level in the cfs was positively correlated with that in the serum when the functions of blood-brain barrier were seriouly impaired .
the il-6 produced in the central nerve system probably played an important role in initiating the acute reactive phase following severe traumatic brain injury .
objectives according to its ct manifestation , classification of the severe brain injury was introduced and the retation between its c t types and prognoses was approached .
the ct dassification was helpful to early and correct assessment of the conditions and prognoses in the patients with severe brain injury .
to study levels of beta-trace protein ( -tp ) in the cerebrospinal fluid with oligodendroglioma patients and in the mediums of incubated rat oligodenderocyte .
human brain cell of oligodendroglioma and non-oligodendroglioma were analyzed by elisa .
the level of -tp in the cerebrospinal fluid with oligodendroglioma patients was 10 ~ 12 folds higher than that in the normal .
moreover , all of the incubated cells , including rat oligodenderocyte , human brain cell of oligodendroglioma and non-oligodendroglioma , could secret -tp .
however , there was a great difference in the level of -tp secreted and in the relation of -tp concentration and cellular proliferation among incubated carcinoma cells .
to explore characteristics of two non-immunoglobulin components with mass of about 10 kd and 14 kd proteins in healthy and patients with myasthenia gravis ( mg ) .
( 1 ) the patterns of serum proteins taken from 35 healthy and 61 mg patients were analysed by sds-page .
( 2 ) concentration of 10 kd protein in healthy and mg sera were determined by elisa with polyclone antibody .
( 3 ) the biological activity of 10 kd protein was determined by observing its effect on proliferation of mononuclear blood cells .
( 1 ) the ratio of scanning area of 10 kd to 14 kd could be taken as an auxiliary index for biochemical diagnosis of mg .
( 2 ) the 10 kd protein possessed a function of regulating healthy cellular proliferation .
to evaluate the occurrence of cdkn2 gene alterati , ons in tumors of central nervous system .
frequent homozygous deletions of the cdkn2 gene were detected in 81 cases of brain and spinal cord tumor resection specimens by pcr method .
the deletion rate of the cdkn2 gene was 60 % in gliomas and was significantly higher in high grade gliomas than in low grade gliomas .
the cdkn2 gene deletions were also detected in meningiomas , neurinomas , pituitary adenomas and metastatic carcinomas to a different degree .
cdkn2 gene loss might bear some relations to the tumor occurrence and transformation in central nervous system .
to detect the common region of loss of heterozygosity ( loh ) in human brain tumors .
high frequency of loh specified for chromosomal loci was associated with the inactivation of tumor suppressor genes .
to assess the expresion of bcl-2 and p53 proteins in brain after hypoxic-ischemic brain damage ( hibd ) as well as the relationship to apoptosis in the neonate .
apoptosis coexisted with necrosis after hibd by tunel , but apoptosis was a major form of cell death .
bcl-2 immunostaining ranged from week to intense ( + + ~ + + + ) in the brain of normal neonatal rat .
after hypoxia ischemia ( hi ) , a decrease or absence in immunoreactivity for bcl-2 in apoptotic and necrotic neurons was observed .
the expression of p53 immunoreactive protein was not detected in the brain of normal neonatal rat , but strong p53-immunoreactive was found in apoptotic and necrotic cells .
to observe the pathomorphological and neurochemical changes in ischemic brain for a long period , so that to find out appropriately therapeutic windows .
the changes of the level of lipid peroxides , nos activities , cerebral water content , etc. could give hint when we define the therapeutic window .
besides thromholysing effect , batroxobin can protect nerve system from ischemic damage when it is used in appropriate stage .
to investigate the role of apolipoprotein e ( apoe ) polymorphism in pathogenesis of ischemic cerebrovascular disease ( icvd ) .
apoe polymorphism showed no significant difference between patients and healthy controls , and no difference was found between patients with atherothrombotic stroke and those with lacunar infarction .
apoe polymorphism is not a risk factor for isehemic stroke .
to study the role of cd5 + b cells in the pathogenic mechanism of myasthenia gravis ( mg ) .

bfgf can protect neurons from acute ischemia , it can also protect bcl-2 , bax proteins that are beneficial to ischemic cell surviving .

these changes may take an important part in increased permeabililty of cerebral vessels and facilitation of fat deposits and atherogenesis .
to explore whether the visual pathway is involved in myasthenia gravis ( mg ) .
pattern reversal visual evoked potentials ( prveps ) were studied in 28 patients with mg and 30 age-matched controls .
visual pathway dysfunction was found in 32 out of 55 eyes examined .
potential iatencies ( pls ) and amplitudes ( amps ) of p100 were significantly longer or lower in mg as compared to that of normal control group .
the changes of pls and amps of p100 in mg are closely associated with the severity of mg , but not with sex or age .
rechecked prvep examinations of 10 patients show that the prvep changes could be improved after treatment .
to explore the value of compressed spectral array ( csa ) in analyzing routine electroencephalogram ( eeg ) .
the routine eegs of 40 normal persons and 30 patients with acute cerebral infarction ( aci ) were analyzed with csa .
csa is a useful device for eeg display , analysis and infarction location .

the conditions of cell survival were determined by mtt method .
4 . concentrations of free ca2 + in cells were assayed by fura-2 technology .
tetrohydroberberine protects neurons from apoptosis induced by -ap , which may be associated with the decrease of ca2 + concentration in cells .

to study the relationship between the body and placenta weights of newborn infant .
the weights of body and placenta of 1300 newborn infants were measured .

2the body and placenta weight of newborn infant are closely relevant .
thirty new zealand adult rabbits weighting 2.5kg were evenly divided into five groups .
standard 10 mm bone defects were created in both radii of each rabbit .
randomly one defect was enveloped with pla membrane wrapped as a tube plus tcp ceramics in it , the contralateral defect served as an untreated control .
general observation , histological and radiological studies were made at 1,3,6,9,12 week postoperatively .
the experinental sides consistently healed with callus extended over the gaps in the membranes .
the control sides showed nonunion , the bone ends were rounded off and sealed with cortical bone .
both the membrane and the ceramics showed good histocompatibility and degenerated with time .
guided bone regeneration is an effective method in healing bone defects , and synergic results could be achieved when combined with ceramics .

the flap with the diameter of 3 cm implanted a nerve 1.5 cm in length could completely be reinnervated in 8 months .

to evaluate extraction force of screw fixation at different position in cancellous fracture .
fifteen embedded cadaveric femurs and tibias were used . the bone mineral density ( bmd ) was measured in condylus femoris and malleolus .
the bmd of condylus femoris averaged 0.30g / cm2 , and that of malleolus averaged 0.47g/cm2 .
in condylus lateralis femoris fracture , the extraction force of a , o , b point were 404.9n , 233.8n and 105.2n respectively .
while in medial malleolus fracture , the data were 335.1n , 193.1n and 141.9n separately .
extraction force was relevant to screw position .
in cancellous fracture , screw should better be inserted at the center point of the fracture plate or adjacent to articular surface .

gissane 's angle was 116.7 8.0 .
these data is very important for calcaneal fracture fixation and restoration .
to provide the morphological standard and basis for the treatment of calcaneal fracture .
the ratio of calcaneal height to length is above 1/2 .
according to the morphological character , there exist mechanical weakness points on calcaneus , which will lead a complex fracture .
the ratio of calcaneal height to length is a convenient index for cacaneus fracture treatment .
both the change of bohler 's angle and gissane 's angle and the width of calcaneus increased are very important to calcaneus fracture diagnose and treatment .
the dimension of calcaneus in this paper could be a reference to reconstruction calcaneus after fracture .

to decrease the injury of medullary vessels by using intramedullary ( im ) nailing in the femur .
sixty percent of the femurs had 2 nutrient arteries and 40 % of them had only 1 nutrient artery . the superior artery had the dominant function .
the medullary foramina were at the super-medial point of femur and middle point of femur .
all im vessels could be damaged by im reaming . conclusion : the main branches of im vessels injury could be avoid by not reaming .
the gap of the im nailing should be firected to the posterior of medullary cavity ( 175 ~ 182 ) .

to explore the effect of different exposure time in 15 % dmso on the biological activity and ultrastructure of cryopreserved rat knee joint with vessels .
the ultrastructure of endothelial cell changed mildly in 1h and 1.5h groups , but serious damaged in 0.5h and 2h groups .
chondrocyte survival rates and viability in 1.5h group were significantly higher than that of other groups ( p < 0.01 ) .
good effect could be received by expose the rat knee joint in 15 % dmso for 1.5 hours at 4c before it preserved by two-step cryopreservation .

the influence factor of barrier number , plastic film position and pressure and the changing characteristic of flame thickness in gas explosion were investigated by a lab experiment .
the result shows that barriers and plastic film have a great influence on the flame thickness in gas explosion .
when the plastic film is put near explosion place , the flame thickness can be increased .
the thicker the flame becomes , the more possible the ignition of flame on substance will be .
the research results are very important for preventing gas explosion in site .
the experimental result shows that these models work efficiently .

to study the distribution of enterogenic endotoxin in peritonitised rats .
the amount of 125i-lps in the unit weight of the each organ are detected . after 125i-lps was poured down the stomach of rats .
cefesulodin and polymyxinb can significantly reduce the amount of 125i-lps .
acute infectious peritonitis can increase the translocation of enterogenic endtoxin .
renal failure and respiratory failure are related with the amount of endotoxin in the unit weight of organic tissue .
cefesulodin and polymyxinb can significantly reduce the mortality and inhibite the translocation of enteroqenic endotoxin in peritonitised rats .

decomposition of the emg signal is a procedure by which the emg signal is separated into its constituent motor unit action potential trains ( muapt ) .
the emg signal usually contains the superposition of the muap produced by a number of neurons in the vicinity of the electrode .
it is therefore necessary to correctly classify the signals generated by different neurons . in this paper this problem is discussed and a classification scheme is developed .
first , the basic motor unit action potentials ( muaps ) are obtained using matched filter , which enables waveform 's shape or amplitude during a muscle contraction .
then , based on these muaps , superimposed waveforms is classified according to area relationship and fuzzy membership function .
the decomposition method has been tested on simulated and real emg data , and the results are satisfactory .

the results indicated that etimicin sulfate is saftety and efficient in treating the lower respiratory tract infection .
to observe the therapeutic efficacy and bacteriological examination of etimicin to genitourinary system infections .
the rate of efficacy was 87.5 % , while bacterial clearance rate was 82.2 % .
no other adverse reaction or toxicity and nephrotoxicity was observed with the exception of one patient with alt slightly higher and the other with a slight dizzy .
etimicin sulfate is an effective agent for genitourinary system infections , its adverse reaction is slight .
to observe the clinical efficacy of etimicin sulfate to the infections of soft tissue .
no other adverse reaction or toxicity and nephrotoxicity was observed with the exception of 28 patients with slight dizziness .
etimicin sulfate is an effective agent with slightly adverse reactions for the infections of soft tissue .
to evaluate the safety of etimicin sulfate in elder patients with infection .

there was no significant difference ( p > 0.05 ) between the parameters of the two groups .

it has the advantages of less trauma , firm fixation , less stress-shielding effect , high rate of fracture healing and less chance of infection .

to study the clinical value of rectangle-shape intramedullary nail for segmental fractures of the tibia shaft .
rectangle-shape intramedullary nail for segmental fractures of the tibia shaft were performed in 15 patients . all patients were analysed and followed up .
15 patients were evaluated according to the criteria of johner and wruh . 9 were assessed as excellent , 4 as good and 1 as fair .
the time for fracture union was 18 weeks in average . delayed union developed in 1 patient with infection .
there were no post-operative compartment syndrome , neurological deficits , implant failure in this series .

1 . fibular fixation can be good for internal fixation stability of tibia fracture ;
2 . repair the anatomical continuation of fibula and is good for ankle joint stability ;
3 . improve healing rate of tibia-fibula fracture .

after operation , functional trial can be done early . it is suitable to treat nonunion of comminuted humeral transcondyl fracture .

[ objective ] to observe the cellular immune responses in a population of an endemic area of schistosomiasis japonica and the influence of praziquantel treatment .

the cytokine levels induced by both antigens were increased significantly after praziqantel treatment especially il-5 and ifn- .
[ conclusion ] the cellular immune responses in the population in schistosomiasis japonica endemic area exhibited a general trend of down-regulation and were elevated significantly after praziquantel treatment .

the structure and ultrastructure of adult of paragonimu s heterotremus were observed by light microscope and transmission electron microscope ( tem ) .
the light microscope showed that the body wall of the worms consisted of outer-tegument , muscular layer , tegumental cells and parenchyma ;
the gut epithelia consisted of single columnar epithelial cells .
the nuclei of the tegumental cells was star-like projection , and the cytoplasm of the tegumental cell included much rough endoplasmic reticulum ( rer ) ;
the fibres of the smooth muscle arranged neatly ;
the cytoplasm of the gut epithelium included a number of rer , mitochondria and secretory bodies with a lot of lamellae in its surface .
the excretory system consisted of flame cells , capillaries , gather tubes and excretory sac ( fig.1-12 , see insert ii , iii ) .

to compare the stiffnesses and the failure strengths of single sacral screw fixation to that of two divergent triangulated sacral screw fixation under different loading conditions .
all specimens were tested with an instron material testing machine .
the strength of fixation seems to have a negative relation with aging .

the arf was used in 6 patients .
to investigate clinical results of disc excision and interbody fusion for the treatment of lumbar discogenic pain .
low back pain improvement and interbody arthrodesis were followed up at least two years .
low back pain improvement was 89 % in cage group , and 91 % in psf group one year after surgery .
pain improvement was up to 93 % in cage group , and 94 % in psf group two years after surgery .
to study the clinical significance of intramedullary high intensity lesion on t2-weighted mri with compressive lesion of the cervical spinal canal .
magnetic resonance ( mr ) imaging was performed in 147 patients with compressive lesion of the cervical spinal canal .
the frequency of this finding was proportional to clinical severity of myelopathy and degree of spinal cord compression .
the pathophysiological basis of such abnormal signal was presumed to vary from acute edema to chronic myelomalacia .
there was a good correlation between the neurological level and the high intensity level on mr images .
the intramedullary lesion on mr images is considered to be the main site of lesion responsible for the neurological symptom .
to analyse the causes of diagnostic errors and reopreation of thoracic spinal stenosis .
twenty-four cases of thoracic spinal stenosis that had been misdiagnosed and with reoperated were studied retrospectively .
one case was decompressed insufficiently and another was done in wrong level .
two cases were underwent posterior laminectomy while the anterior oppresion of medulla was still existed .
all of the above conditions could result in misdiagnosis and reoperation of thoracic spinal stenosis .

to study the influence of different types of operation and anesthesia on intraoperative cardiovascular complication of geriatric noncardiac surgery .
retrospective analyze the clinical data of 3088 patients undergone geriatric noncardiac surgery .
the average age of noncardiac geriatric patients suffered from intraoperative cardiovascular complication is older than the patient about no complication . male has more complication than female .
the complication morbidity of operation on urologic system is obviously much more than that on other systems , and of the prostatectomy is the most .
the morbidity of intraoperative cardiovascular complication in patients with spinal anesthesia is higher than that with general of local anesthesia .
advanced age , male , operation on urologic system and spinal , anesthesia type are some of the risk factors for intraoperative cardiovascular complication in geriatric noncardiac surgery .

methods 313 patients with craniocerebral trauma underwent head ct scanning , within 1 ~ 4 days all patients underwent head ct scanning again .

the gcs score did not correlated with the type of delayed intracranial hemorrhage .

to research the clinical significance of immediate percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty ( ptca ) in patients with acute myocardial infarction ( ami ) .

the others was no improved significantly .
after ptca , the left ventricular function was improved significantly in patients with ami .
